  ## 11. Summary Table of Toolchain
+ 
+ | Category | Tool / Library | Purpose & Rationale |
+ |----------|----------------|---------------------|
+ | **Monorepo & Build** | **Nx (v16+)** | Monorepo management, project graph, distributed caching, affected tasks, generators, executors |
+ | | **Nx Cloud** | Remote caching, build analytics, team collaboration, resource optimization, cost tracking |
+ | | **SWC (v0.2.x)** | Fast TypeScript compilation, Nx integration, build optimization, resource management |
+ | | **Esbuild (v0.18+)** | Production bundling, tree-shaking, Nx integration, performance optimization |
+ | | **pnpm (v8+)** | Workspace management, dependency resolution, Nx integration, resource optimization |
+ | **Testing & Coverage** | **Jest (v29+)** | Unit testing, Nx integration, coverage reporting, performance optimization |
+ | | **Playwright (v2.0+)** | E2E testing, Nx integration, cross-browser testing, visual regression |
+ | | **LitmusChaos (v2.0+)** | Chaos engineering, Nx integration, resilience testing, recovery validation |
+ | **Observability** | **OpenTelemetry (v2.0+)** | Tracing, metrics, Nx integration, build monitoring, performance analysis |
+ | | **Nx Cloud Analytics** | Build analytics, performance tracking, resource usage, cost analysis |
+ | | **Structured Logging** | Log management, Nx integration, build logs, test logs, cache logs |
+ | **Security & Compliance** | **Nx Security** | Dependency scanning, vulnerability detection, license compliance, supply chain integrity |
+ | | **Nx Cloud Security** | Cloud security, data protection, compliance reporting, access control |
+ | **Documentation & DX** | **Nx Documentation** | Project docs, API docs, CLI docs, architecture docs, development guides |
+ | | **Nx CLI** | Build commands, test commands, cache commands, resource commands |
+ | | **Developer Experience** | IDE integration, debugging tools, testing tools, build tools |
+ | **Registry & Discovery** | **Nx Project Registry** | Project descriptions, dependencies, configurations, capabilities |
+ | | **Nx Cloud Registry** | Cloud registry, integration, security, project management |
  
  * **Toolchain Summary**: A concise overview of the toolchain's components and their functionalities.

+           path: artifacts

+       - name: Monitor performance

+ ## Nx Cloud Integration

+ 
+ ```json
+ // nx.json
+ {
+   "targetDefaults": {
+     "build": {
+       "dependsOn": ["^build"],
+       "inputs": [
+         "default",
+         "^default",
+         "{workspaceRoot}/nx.json",
+         "{workspaceRoot}/tsconfig.base.json"
+       ],
+       "outputs": ["{projectRoot}/dist"],
+       "cache": true
+     },
+     "test": {
+       "dependsOn": ["^build"],
+       "inputs": [
+         "default",
+         "^default",
+         "{workspaceRoot}/nx.json",
+         "{workspaceRoot}/jest.config.ts"
+       ],
+       "cache": true
+     },
+     "lint": {
+       "inputs": [
+         "default",
+         "{workspaceRoot}/.eslintrc.json",
+         "{workspaceRoot}/nx.json"
+       ],
+       "cache": true
+     },
+     "e2e": {
+       "dependsOn": ["^build"],
+       "inputs": [
+         "default",

+         "{workspaceRoot}/nx.json",

+     detailed: true
+     build: true
+     test: true
+     development: true
+     cache: true
+     security: true
+     team: true
+     project: true
+     system: true
+   ```
+ 
+ * **Custom Cost Configuration**:
+   ```json
+   {
+     "costTools": {
+       "enabled": true,
+       "detailed": true,
+       "build": true,
+       "test": true,
+       "development": true,
+       "cache": true,
+       "security": true,
+       "team": true,
+       "project": true,
+       "system": true
+     }
+   }
+   ```

```diff
  ## Production Deployment
  
+ ### Nx Production Setup
+ 
+ 1. **Build Configuration**
+    ```json
+    {
+      "targetDefaults": {
+        "build": {
+          "dependsOn": ["^build"],
+          "inputs": ["production", "^production"],
+          "outputs": ["{projectRoot}/dist"],
+          "cache": true,
+          "optimization": true,
+          "sourceMap": false,
+          "namedChunks": false,
+          "vendorChunk": true,
+          "buildOptimizer": true,
+          "budgets": [
+            {
+              "type": "initial",
+              "maximumWarning": "2mb",
+              "maximumError": "5mb"
+            }
+          ]
+        }
+      }
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Deployment Configuration**
+    ```json
+    {
+      "targetDefaults": {
+        "deploy": {
+          "dependsOn": ["build"],
+          "inputs": ["production", "^production"],
+          "cache": true,
+          "parallel": 3,
+          "maxParallel": 5,
+          "timeout": 1800,
+          "retry": 3,
+          "retryDelay": 1000
+        }
+      }
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Environment Configuration**
+    ```json
+    {
+      "targetDefaults": {
+        "serve": {
+          "dependsOn": ["^build"],
+          "inputs": ["production", "^production"],
+          "cache": true,
+          "host": "0.0.0.0",
+          "port": 4200,
+          "ssl": true,
+          "sslKey": "ssl/server.key",
+          "sslCert": "ssl/server.crt"
+        }
+      }
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Production Deployment Process
+ 
+ 1. **Build Process**
+    ```bash
+    # Build all projects
+    nx run-many --target=build --all --configuration=production
+ 
+    # Build affected projects
+    nx affected:build --configuration=production
+ 
+    # Build specific project
+    nx build project-name --configuration=production
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Test Process**
+    ```bash
+    # Test all projects
+    nx run-many --target=test --all --configuration=production
+ 
+    # Test affected projects
+    nx affected:test --configuration=production
+ 
+    # Test specific project
+    nx test project-name --configuration=production
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Deploy Process**
+    ```bash
+    # Deploy all projects
+    nx run-many --target=deploy --all --configuration=production
+ 
+    # Deploy affected projects
+    nx affected:deploy --configuration=production
+ 
+    # Deploy specific project
+    nx deploy project-name --configuration=production
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Production Monitoring
+ 
+ 1. **Nx Cloud Monitoring**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable Nx Cloud monitoring
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-nx-cloud-monitoring
+ 
+    # Configure monitoring
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-monitoring
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Performance Monitoring**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable performance monitoring
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-performance-monitoring
+ 
+    # Configure performance metrics
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-performance-metrics
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Resource Monitoring**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable resource monitoring
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-resource-monitoring
+ 
+    # Configure resource metrics
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-resource-metrics
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Production Security
+ 
+ 1. **Security Configuration**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable security features
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-security
+ 
+    # Configure security policies
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-security-policies
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Access Control**

+    # Enable access control

---

```diff
  ### Docker Images
  
- 1. **Build Images**
- 
-    ```bash
-    # Build all images
-    nx run-many --target=build --all
- 
-    # Build Docker images
-    nx run-many --target=docker-build --all
- 
-    # Or build specific components
-    nx docker-build nootropic-cli
-    nx docker-build nootropic-vscode-ext
-    nx docker-build nootropic-electron
-    ```
- 
- 2. **Push to Registry**
- 
+ 1. **Nx Docker Configuration**
+    ```dockerfile
+    # Base image
+    FROM node:18-alpine AS base
+    WORKDIR /app
+    RUN npm install -g pnpm@8 nx@16
+ 
+    # Builder image
+    FROM base AS builder
+    COPY . .
+    RUN pnpm install
+    RUN nx build --configuration=production
+ 
+    # Production image
+    FROM base AS production
+    COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist
+    COPY --from=builder /app/node_modules ./node_modules
+    EXPOSE 4200
+    CMD ["nx", "serve", "--configuration=production"]
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Multi-stage Build**
+    ```dockerfile
+    # Development image
+    FROM node:18-alpine AS development
+    WORKDIR /app
+    RUN npm install -g pnpm@8 nx@16
+    COPY . .
+    RUN pnpm install
+    CMD ["nx", "serve", "--configuration=development"]
+ 
+    # Test image
+    FROM development AS test
+    CMD ["nx", "test", "--configuration=production"]
+ 
+    # Production image
+    FROM node:18-alpine AS production
+    WORKDIR /app
+    COPY --from=development /app/dist ./dist
+    COPY --from=development /app/node_modules ./node_modules
+    EXPOSE 4200
+    CMD ["nx", "serve", "--configuration=production"]
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Docker Compose**
+    ```yaml
+    version: '3.8'
+    services:
+      app:
+        build:
+          context: .
+          target: production
+        ports:
+          - "4200:4200"
+        environment:
+          - NODE_ENV=production
+          - NX_CLOUD_TOKEN=${NX_CLOUD_TOKEN}
+        volumes:
+          - .:/app
+          - /app/node_modules
+        networks:
+          - nootropic-network
+ 
+      temporal:
+        image: temporalio/auto-setup:1.20.0
+        ports:
+          - "7233:7233"
+          - "7234:7234"
+          - "7235:7235"
+        environment:
+          - DYNAMIC_CONFIG_FILE_PATH=config/dynamicconfig/development.yaml
+        volumes:
+          - ./temporal:/etc/temporal/config/dynamicconfig
+        networks:
+          - nootropic-network
+ 
+      vector-store:
+        image: weaviate/weaviate:1.20.0
+        ports:
+          - "8080:8080"
+        environment:
+          - QUERY_DEFAULTS_LIMIT=25
+          - AUTHENTICATION_ANONYMOUS_ACCESS_ENABLED=true
+          - PERSISTENCE_DATA_PATH=/var/lib/weaviate
+          - DEFAULT_VECTORIZER_MODULE=none
+          - CLUSTER_HOSTNAME=node1
+        volumes:
+          - weaviate_data:/var/lib/weaviate
+        networks:
+          - nootropic-network
+ 
+    volumes:
+      weaviate_data:
+ 
+    networks:
+      nootropic-network:
+        driver: bridge
+    ```
+ 
+ 4. **Docker Build Commands**
     ```bash
-    # Push all images
-    nx run-many --target=docker-push --all
- 
-    # Or push specific components
-    nx docker-push nootropic-cli
-    nx docker-push nootropic-vscode-ext
-    nx docker-push nootropic-electron
+    # Build development image
+    docker build --target development -t nootropic-dev .
+ 
+    # Build test image
+    docker build --target test -t nootropic-test .
+ 
+    # Build production image
+    docker build --target production -t nootropic-prod .
+ 
+    # Run development container
+    docker run -it --rm -p 4200:4200 nootropic-dev
+ 
+    # Run test container
+    docker run -it --rm nootropic-test
+ 
+    # Run production container
+    docker run -it --rm -p 4200:4200 nootropic-prod
+    ```
+ 
+ 5. **Docker Compose Commands**
+    ```bash
+    # Start all services
+    docker-compose up -d
+ 
+    # Start specific service
+    docker-compose up -d app
+ 
+    # Stop all services
+    docker-compose down
+ 
+    # Stop specific service
+    docker-compose stop app
+ 
+    # View logs
+    docker-compose logs -f app
+ 
+    # Rebuild services
+    docker-compose build app
+ 
+    # Restart services
+    docker-compose restart app
     ```
  
```

```diff
  ### Kubernetes Deployment
  
- 1. **Base Infrastructure**
- 
-    ```bash
-    # Deploy base infrastructure
-    kubectl apply -f k8s/base/
-    ```
- 
- > **See Also**: [Kubernetes Setup](../TECH_STACK.md#deployment--orchestration) for infrastructure details.
- 
- 2. **Core Services**
- 
+ 1. **Nx Kubernetes Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # Deployment
+    apiVersion: apps/v1
+    kind: Deployment
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-app
+      labels:
+        app: nootropic
+    spec:
+      replicas: 3
+      selector:
+        matchLabels:
+          app: nootropic
+      template:
+        metadata:
+          labels:
+            app: nootropic
+        spec:
+          containers:
+          - name: nootropic
+            image: nootropic:latest
+            ports:
+            - containerPort: 4200
+            env:
+            - name: NODE_ENV
+              value: "production"
+            - name: NX_CLOUD_TOKEN
+              valueFrom:
+                secretKeyRef:
+                  name: nx-cloud-secret
+                  key: token
+            resources:
+              requests:
+                memory: "256Mi"
+                cpu: "250m"
+              limits:
+                memory: "512Mi"
+                cpu: "500m"
+            livenessProbe:
+              httpGet:
+                path: /health
+                port: 4200
+              initialDelaySeconds: 30
+              periodSeconds: 10
+            readinessProbe:
+              httpGet:
+                path: /ready
+                port: 4200
+              initialDelaySeconds: 5
+              periodSeconds: 5
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Service Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # Service
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: Service
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-service
+    spec:
+      selector:
+        app: nootropic
+      ports:
+      - port: 80
+        targetPort: 4200
+      type: LoadBalancer
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Ingress Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # Ingress
+    apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
+    kind: Ingress
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-ingress
+      annotations:
+        nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
+    spec:
+      rules:
+      - host: nootropic.example.com
+        http:
+          paths:
+          - path: /
+            pathType: Prefix
+            backend:
+              service:
+                name: nootropic-service
+                port:
+                  number: 80
+      tls:
+      - hosts:
+        - nootropic.example.com
+        secretName: nootropic-tls
+    ```
+ 
+ 4. **ConfigMap Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # ConfigMap
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: ConfigMap
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-config
+    data:
+      NODE_ENV: "production"
+      NX_CLOUD_URL: "https://nx.app"
+      NX_CLOUD_ENABLED: "true"
+      NX_CLOUD_DISTRIBUTED_CACHING: "true"
+      NX_CLOUD_REMOTE_EXECUTION: "true"
+    ```
+ 
+ 5. **Secret Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # Secret
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: Secret
+    metadata:
+      name: nx-cloud-secret
+    type: Opaque
+    data:
+      token: <base64-encoded-token>
+    ```
+ 
+ 6. **Kubernetes Commands**
     ```bash
-    # Deploy Temporal
-    helm install temporal temporal/temporal \
-      --namespace nootropic \
-      --values k8s/values/temporal.yaml
+    # Apply configurations
+    kubectl apply -f k8s/deployment.yaml
+    kubectl apply -f k8s/service.yaml
+    kubectl apply -f k8s/ingress.yaml
+    kubectl apply -f k8s/configmap.yaml
+    kubectl apply -f k8s/secret.yaml
  
-    # Deploy Vector Store
-    helm install weaviate weaviate/weaviate \
-      --namespace nootropic \
-      --values k8s/values/weaviate.yaml
-    ```
- 
- > **See Also**: [Service Deployment](../OPERATIONS.md#deployment-procedures) for service deployment procedures.
- 
- 3. **Application Components**
- 
-    ```bash
-    # Deploy workers
-    kubectl apply -f k8s/workers/
- 
-    # Deploy API
-    kubectl apply -f k8s/api/
+    # View resources
+    kubectl get deployments
+    kubectl get services
+    kubectl get ingress
+    kubectl get configmaps
+    kubectl get secrets
+ 
+    # View logs
+    kubectl logs -f deployment/nootropic-app
+ 
+    # Scale deployment
+    kubectl scale deployment nootropic-app --replicas=5
+ 
+    # Update deployment
+    kubectl set image deployment/nootropic-app nootropic=nootropic:new-version
+ 
+    # Rollback deployment
+    kubectl rollout undo deployment/nootropic-app
     ```
  
```

  ## Scaling
  
- ### Build System Scaling
- 
- 1. **Nx Cloud Scaling**
+ ### Nx Build Scaling
  
  ```yaml
-    # nx.json
-    {
-      "tasksRunnerOptions": {
-        "default": {
-          "runner": "nx-cloud",
-          "options": {
-            "cacheableOperations": ["build", "test", "lint"],
-            "parallel": 5,
-            "distributedCaching": true,
-            "distributedExecution": true,
-            "agentCount": 3
-          }
-        }
-      }
-    }
-    ```
- 
- 2. **CI/CD Scaling**
- 
-    ```yaml
-    # .github/workflows/ci.yml
-    name: CI
-    on: [push, pull_request]
-    jobs:
-      build:
-        runs-on: ubuntu-latest
-        strategy:
-          matrix:
-            parallel: 3
-        steps:
-          - uses: actions/checkout@v3
-          - uses: actions/setup-node@v3
-            with:
-              node-version: '18'
-          - uses: pnpm/action-setup@v2
-            with:
-              version: 8
-          - run: pnpm install
-          - run: nx affected:build --parallel=3
-          - run: nx affected:test --parallel=3
-    ```
- 
- 3. **Cache Scaling**
- 
-    ```yaml
-    # nx.json
-    {
-      "tasksRunnerOptions": {
-        "default": {
-          "runner": "nx-cloud",
-          "options": {
-            "cacheableOperations": ["build", "test", "lint"],
-            "parallel": 5,

```diff
     ```
  
+ ## Security
+ 
+ ### Nx Security Configuration
+ 
+ 1. **Build Security**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable build security
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-build-security
+ 
+    # Configure build security
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-security-config
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Test Security**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable test security
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-test-security
+ 
+    # Configure test security
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-test-security-config
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Deployment Security**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable deployment security
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-deployment-security
+ 
+    # Configure deployment security
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-deployment-security-config
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Kubernetes Security
+ 
+ 1. **Network Policies**
+    ```yaml
+    # NetworkPolicy
+    apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
+    kind: NetworkPolicy
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-network-policy
+    spec:
+      podSelector:
+        matchLabels:
+          app: nootropic
+      policyTypes:
+      - Ingress
+      - Egress
+      ingress:
+      - from:
+        - podSelector:
+            matchLabels:
+              app: nootropic
+        ports:
+        - protocol: TCP
+          port: 80
+      egress:
+      - to:
+        - podSelector:
+            matchLabels:
+              app: nootropic
+        ports:
+        - protocol: TCP
+          port: 80
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Pod Security Policies**
+    ```yaml
+    # PodSecurityPolicy
+    apiVersion: policy/v1beta1
+    kind: PodSecurityPolicy
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-psp
+    spec:
+      privileged: false
+      seLinux:
+        rule: RunAsAny
+      runAsUser:
+        rule: MustRunAsNonRoot
+      fsGroup:
+        rule: MustRunAs
+        ranges:
+        - min: 1
+          max: 65535
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Security Context**
+    ```yaml
+    # SecurityContext
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: Pod
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-pod
+    spec:
+      securityContext:
+        runAsNonRoot: true
+        runAsUser: 1000
+        runAsGroup: 1000
+        fsGroup: 1000
+      containers:
+      - name: nootropic
+        securityContext:
+          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
+          capabilities:
+            drop:
+            - ALL
+          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Prometheus Security
+ 
+ 1. **ServiceMonitor Security**
+    ```yaml
+    # ServiceMonitor
+    apiVersion: monitoring.coreos.com/v1
+    kind: ServiceMonitor
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-monitor
+    spec:
+      selector:
+        matchLabels:
+          app: nootropic
+      endpoints:
+      - port: metrics
+        interval: 15s
+        path: /metrics
+        bearerTokenSecret:
+          name: nootropic-token
+        tlsConfig:
+          caFile: /etc/prometheus/secrets/nootropic-ca/ca.crt
+          certFile: /etc/prometheus/secrets/nootropic-cert/tls.crt
+          keyFile: /etc/prometheus/secrets/nootropic-key/tls.key
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **PrometheusRule Security**
+    ```yaml
+    # PrometheusRule
+    apiVersion: monitoring.coreos.com/v1
+    kind: PrometheusRule
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-security-alerts
+    spec:
+      groups:
+      - name: nootropic
+        rules:
+        - alert: SecurityBreach
+          expr: nootropic_security_breach_total > 0
+          for: 1m
+          labels:
+            severity: critical
+          annotations:
+            summary: Security breach detected
+            description: A security breach has been detected in the Nootropic application
+        - alert: UnauthorizedAccess
+          expr: nootropic_unauthorized_access_total > 0
+          for: 1m
+          labels:
+            severity: critical
+          annotations:
+            summary: Unauthorized access detected
+            description: Unauthorized access has been detected in the Nootropic application
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Grafana Dashboard Security**
+    ```yaml
+    # GrafanaDashboard
+    apiVersion: integreatly.org/v1alpha1
+    kind: GrafanaDashboard
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-security-dashboard
+    spec:
+      json: |
+        {
+          "dashboard": {
+            "id": null,
+            "title": "Nootropic Security Dashboard",
+            "tags": ["nootropic", "security"],
+            "timezone": "browser",
+            "panels": [
+              {
+                "title": "Security Breaches",
+                "type": "graph",
+                "datasource": "Prometheus",
+                "targets": [
+                  {
+                    "expr": "nootropic_security_breach_total",
+                    "legendFormat": "{{pod}}"
+                  }
+                ]
+              },
+              {
+                "title": "Unauthorized Access",

+ 
+ ### Nx Cloud Scaling
+ 
+ ```yaml
+ # Horizontal Pod Autoscaler
+ apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
+ kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
+ metadata:
+   name: nootropic-cloud-hpa
+ spec:
+   scaleTargetRef:
+     apiVersion: apps/v1
+     kind: Deployment
+     name: nootropic-cloud
+   minReplicas: 2
+   maxReplicas: 10
+   metrics:
+   - type: Resource
+     resource:
+       name: cpu
+       target:
+         type: Utilization
+         averageUtilization: 70
+   - type: Resource
+     resource:
+       name: memory
+       target:
+         type: Utilization
+         averageUtilization: 80
+ ```
+ 
+ ### Scaling Commands
+ 
+ ```bash
+ # Scale build deployment
+ kubectl scale deployment nootropic-build --replicas=5
+ 
+ # Scale test deployment
+ kubectl scale deployment nootropic-test --replicas=5
+ 
+ # Scale cloud deployment
+ kubectl scale deployment nootropic-cloud --replicas=5
+ 
+ # View scaling status
+ kubectl get hpa
+ 
+ # View scaling events
+ kubectl describe hpa nootropic-build-hpa
+ kubectl describe hpa nootropic-test-hpa
+ kubectl describe hpa nootropic-cloud-hpa
+ ```
+ 
+ ### Scaling Configuration
+ 
+ ```yaml

+   name: nootropic-cloud-config

+   NX_CLOUD_SCALING_MAX_REPLICAS: "10"

+ ## Rollback Strategy
+ 
+ ### Nx Rollback Strategy
+ 
+ 1. **Build Rollback**
+    ```bash
+    # Rollback specific project build
+    nx rollback build --project=project-name --version=previous-version
+ 
+    # Rollback all project builds
+    nx rollback build --all --version=previous-version
+ 
+    # Rollback affected project builds
+    nx affected:rollback build --version=previous-version
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Test Rollback**
+    ```bash
+    # Rollback specific project tests
+    nx rollback test --project=project-name --version=previous-version
+ 
+    # Rollback all project tests
+    nx rollback test --all --version=previous-version
+ 
+    # Rollback affected project tests
+    nx affected:rollback test --version=previous-version
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Deployment Rollback**
+    ```bash
+    # Rollback specific project deployment
+    nx rollback deploy --project=project-name --version=previous-version
+ 
+    # Rollback all project deployments
+    nx rollback deploy --all --version=previous-version
+ 
+    # Rollback affected project deployments
+    nx affected:rollback deploy --version=previous-version
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Kubernetes Rollback
+ 
+ 1. **Deployment Rollback**
+    ```bash
+    # Rollback to previous version
+    kubectl rollout undo deployment/nootropic-app
+ 
+    # Rollback to specific revision
+    kubectl rollout undo deployment/nootropic-app --to-revision=2
+ 
+    # View rollback history
+    kubectl rollout history deployment/nootropic-app
+ 
+    # View specific revision
+    kubectl rollout history deployment/nootropic-app --revision=2
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Service Rollback**
+    ```bash
+    # Rollback service to previous version
+    kubectl rollout undo service/nootropic-service
+ 
+    # Rollback to specific revision
+    kubectl rollout undo service/nootropic-service --to-revision=2
+ 
+    # View rollback history
+    kubectl rollout history service/nootropic-service
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **ConfigMap Rollback**
+    ```bash
+    # Rollback ConfigMap to previous version
+    kubectl rollout undo configmap/nootropic-config
+ 
+    # Rollback to specific revision
+    kubectl rollout undo configmap/nootropic-config --to-revision=2
+ 
+    # View rollback history
+    kubectl rollout history configmap/nootropic-config
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Rollback Monitoring
+ 
+ 1. **Nx Cloud Monitoring**
+    ```bash
+    # Monitor rollback status
+    nx cloud:monitor rollback
+ 
+    # View rollback history
+    nx cloud:history rollback
+ 
+    # View rollback metrics
+    nx cloud:metrics rollback
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Kubernetes Monitoring**
+    ```bash
+    # Monitor deployment rollback
+    kubectl rollout status deployment/nootropic-app
+ 
+    # Monitor service rollback
+    kubectl rollout status service/nootropic-service
+ 
+    # Monitor ConfigMap rollback
+    kubectl rollout status configmap/nootropic-config
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Prometheus Monitoring**
+    ```yaml
+    # PrometheusRule for rollback alerts
+    apiVersion: monitoring.coreos.com/v1
+    kind: PrometheusRule
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-rollback-alerts
+    spec:
+      groups:
+      - name: nootropic.rollback
+        rules:
+        - alert: RollbackDetected
+          expr: nootropic_rollback_total > 0
+          for: 1m
+          labels:
+            severity: warning
+          annotations:
+            summary: Rollback detected
+            description: A rollback has been detected in the nootropic deployment
+    ```
+

+    apiVersion: monitoring.coreos.com/v1

+          app: nootropic

+ 2. **PrometheusRule Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # PrometheusRule
+    apiVersion: monitoring.coreos.com/v1
+    kind: PrometheusRule
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-alerts
+    spec:
+      groups:
+      - name: nootropic
+        rules:
+        - alert: HighCPUUsage
+          expr: container_cpu_usage_seconds_total > 0.8
+          for: 5m
+          labels:
+            severity: warning
+          annotations:
+            summary: High CPU usage detected
+            description: CPU usage is above 80% for 5 minutes
+        - alert: HighMemoryUsage
+          expr: container_memory_usage_bytes > 0.8
+          for: 5m
+          labels:
+            severity: warning
+          annotations:
+            summary: High memory usage detected
+            description: Memory usage is above 80% for 5 minutes
+    ```
+

+ ## Disaster Recovery
+ 
+ ### Recovery Procedures
+ 
+ 1. **Service Recovery**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s/recovery/service-recovery.yaml
+    apiVersion: batch/v1
+    kind: Job
+    metadata:
+      name: service-recovery
+    spec:
+      template:
+        spec:
+          containers:
+            - name: recovery
+              image: nootropic/recovery:latest
+              command: ["./recover.sh"]
+              env:
+                - name: BACKUP_PATH
+                  value: "/backups/latest"
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Data Recovery**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Restore from backup
+    ./scripts/restore-data.sh --backup-id latest
+ 
+    # Verify data integrity
+    ./scripts/verify-data.sh
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Failover Configuration
+ 
+ 1. **Multi-Region Setup**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s/failover/multi-region.yaml
+    apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
+    kind: Ingress
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-global
+      annotations:
+        kubernetes.io/ingress.class: "global"
+    spec:
+      rules:
+        - host: api.nootropic.ai
+          http:
+            paths:
+              - path: /
+                pathType: Prefix
+                backend:
+                  service:
+                    name: nootropic-api
+                    port:
+                      number: 80
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Health Checks**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s/health/liveness.yaml
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: ConfigMap
+    metadata:
+      name: health-checks
+    data:
+      liveness.sh: |
+        #!/bin/sh
+        curl -f http://localhost:8080/health || exit 1
+      readiness.sh: |
+        #!/bin/sh
+        curl -f http://localhost:8080/ready || exit 1
+    ```
+ 
+ ## Backup & Restore
+ 
+ ### Nx Cloud Backup
+ 
+ 1. **Build Cache Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup build cache
+    nx cloud:backup build-cache
+ 
+    # Restore build cache
+    nx cloud:restore build-cache
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Test Cache Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup test cache
+    nx cloud:backup test-cache
+ 
+    # Restore test cache
+    nx cloud:restore test-cache
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Deployment Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup deployment
+    nx cloud:backup deployment
+ 
+    # Restore deployment
+    nx cloud:restore deployment
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Kubernetes Backup
+ 
+ 1. **Resource Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup resources
+    kubectl get all -o yaml > backup.yaml
+ 
+    # Restore resources
+    kubectl apply -f backup.yaml
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Persistent Volume Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup persistent volume
+    kubectl exec -it nootropic-pod -- tar -czf /backup/data.tar.gz /data
+ 
+    # Restore persistent volume
+    kubectl exec -it nootropic-pod -- tar -xzf /backup/data.tar.gz -C /data
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **ConfigMap and Secret Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup ConfigMap and Secret
+    kubectl get configmap,secret -o yaml > config-backup.yaml
+ 
+    # Restore ConfigMap and Secret
+    kubectl apply -f config-backup.yaml
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Prometheus Backup
+ 
+ 1. **Metrics Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup metrics
+    prometheus-backup --storage.path=/prometheus --backup.path=/backup
+ 
+    # Restore metrics
+    prometheus-restore --storage.path=/prometheus --backup.path=/backup
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Alert Rules Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup alert rules
+    kubectl get prometheusrules -o yaml > alert-rules-backup.yaml
+ 
+    # Restore alert rules
+    kubectl apply -f alert-rules-backup.yaml
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Grafana Dashboard Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup Grafana dashboards
+    grafana-backup --api-key=YOUR_API_KEY --backup.path=/backup
+ 
+    # Restore Grafana dashboards
+    grafana-restore --api-key=YOUR_API_KEY --backup.path=/backup
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Backup Configuration
+ 
+ 1. **Nx Cloud Backup Configuration**

+ ## Security Hardening
+ 
+ ### Network Security
+ 
+ 1. **Network Policies**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s/security/network-policy.yaml
+    apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
+    kind: NetworkPolicy
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-policy
+    spec:
+      podSelector:
+        matchLabels:
+          app: nootropic
+      policyTypes:
+        - Ingress
+        - Egress
+      ingress:
+        - from:
+            - namespaceSelector:
+                matchLabels:
+                  name: nootropic
+      egress:
+        - to:
+            - namespaceSelector:
+                matchLabels:
+                  name: nootropic
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **TLS Configuration**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s/security/tls.yaml
+    apiVersion: cert-manager.io/v1
+    kind: Certificate
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-cert
+    spec:
+      secretName: nootropic-tls
+      issuerRef:
+        name: letsencrypt-prod
+      dnsNames:
+        - api.nootropic.ai
+        - app.nootropic.ai
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Access Control
+ 
+ 1. **RBAC Configuration**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s/security/rbac.yaml
+    apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
+    kind: Role
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-role
+    rules:
+      - apiGroups: [""]
+        resources: ["pods", "services"]
+        verbs: ["get", "list", "watch"]
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Service Accounts**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s/security/service-account.yaml
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: ServiceAccount
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-sa
+    ```
+

+ 
+ ### Audit Logging
+ 
+ 1. **Audit Configuration**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s/audit/audit-policy.yaml
+    apiVersion: audit.k8s.io/v1
+    kind: Policy
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-audit
+    rules:
+      - level: Metadata
+        resources:
+          - group: ""
+            resources: ["pods"]
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Log Collection**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s/audit/log-collector.yaml
+    apiVersion: apps/v1
+    kind: DaemonSet
+    metadata:
+      name: log-collector
+    spec:
+      template:
+        spec:
+          containers:
+            - name: collector
+              image: nootropic/log-collector:latest
+              volumeMounts:
+                - name: audit-logs
+                  mountPath: /var/log/audit
+    ```
+

+ 1. **Security Scanning**

+      name: security-scan
+    spec:
+      schedule: "0 0 * * 0"
+      jobTemplate:
+        spec:
+          template:
+            spec:

+ ## Security
+ 
+ ### Nx Security Configuration
+ 
+ 1. **Build Security**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable build security
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-build-security
+ 
+    # Configure build security
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-security-config
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Test Security**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable test security
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-test-security
+ 
+    # Configure test security
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-test-security-config
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Deployment Security**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable deployment security
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-deployment-security
+ 
+    # Configure deployment security
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-deployment-security-config
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Kubernetes Security
+ 
+ 1. **Network Policies**
+    ```yaml
+    # NetworkPolicy
+    apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
+    kind: NetworkPolicy
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-network-policy
+    spec:
+      podSelector:
+        matchLabels:
+          app: nootropic
+      policyTypes:
+      - Ingress
+      - Egress
+      ingress:
+      - from:
+        - podSelector:
+            matchLabels:
+              app: nootropic
+        ports:
+        - protocol: TCP
+          port: 80
+      egress:
+      - to:
+        - podSelector:
+            matchLabels:
+              app: nootropic
+        ports:
+        - protocol: TCP
+          port: 80
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Pod Security Policies**
+    ```yaml
+    # PodSecurityPolicy
+    apiVersion: policy/v1beta1
+    kind: PodSecurityPolicy
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-psp
+    spec:
+      privileged: false
+      seLinux:
+        rule: RunAsAny
+      runAsUser:
+        rule: MustRunAsNonRoot
+      fsGroup:
+        rule: MustRunAs
+        ranges:
+        - min: 1
+          max: 65535
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Security Context**
+    ```yaml
+    # SecurityContext
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: Pod
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-pod
+    spec:
+      securityContext:
+        runAsNonRoot: true
+        runAsUser: 1000
+        runAsGroup: 1000
+        fsGroup: 1000
+      containers:
+      - name: nootropic
+        securityContext:
+          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
+          capabilities:
+            drop:
+            - ALL
+          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Prometheus Security
+ 
+ 1. **ServiceMonitor Security**
+    ```yaml
+    # ServiceMonitor
+    apiVersion: monitoring.coreos.com/v1
+    kind: ServiceMonitor
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-monitor
+    spec:
+      selector:
+        matchLabels:
+          app: nootropic
+      endpoints:
+      - port: metrics
+ # Deployment Guide
+ 
+ [![Documentation](https://img.shields.io/badge/docs-latest-blue.svg)](https://docs.nootropic.dev)
+ [![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-green.svg)](LICENSE)
+ 
+ > **NOTE**: The canonical source for the technology and tool stack is `docs/TOOLCHAIN.md`. This document provides deployment guidance.
+ 
+ This document provides comprehensive guidance for deploying the nootropic platform in both development and production environments.
+ 
+ ## Table of Contents
+ 
+ - [Architecture Overview](#architecture-overview)
+ - [Local Development Deployment](#local-development-deployment)
+ - [Production Deployment](#production-deployment)
+ - [Model Deployment](#model-deployment)
+ - [Configuration Management](#configuration-management)
+ - [Scaling](#scaling)
+ - [Rollback Strategy](#rollback-strategy)
+ - [Monitoring](#monitoring)
+ - [Troubleshooting](#troubleshooting)
+ - [Disaster Recovery](#disaster-recovery)
+ - [Backup & Restore](#backup--restore)
+ - [Security Hardening](#security-hardening)
+ - [Compliance & Auditing](#compliance--auditing)
+ 
+ ## Architecture Overview
+ 
+ ### Development Environment
+ 
+ ```mermaid
+ graph TD
+     A[Developer Machine] --> B[Local Services]
+     B --> C[Temporal Server]
+     B --> D[Tabby ML]
+     B --> E[Weaviate/Chroma]
+     A --> F[Development Tools]
+     F --> G[VS Code Extension]
+     F --> H[CLI]
+     F --> I[Electron App]
+ ```
+ 
+ > **See Also**: [Architecture Overview](../ARCHITECTURE.md#introduction--goals) for detailed architecture documentation.
+ 
+ ### Production Environment
+ 
+ ```mermaid
+ graph TD
+     A[Load Balancer] --> B[Kubernetes Cluster]
+     B --> C[Worker Nodes]
+     C --> D[Temporal Workers]
+     C --> E[Tabby ML Workers]
+     C --> F[Vector Store]
+     B --> G[Stateful Services]
+     G --> H[Temporal Server]
+     G --> I[Vector Store]
+     G --> J[Object Store]
+ ```
+ 
+ > **See Also**: [Production Architecture](../ARCHITECTURE.md#production-architecture) for production deployment details.
+ 
+ ## Local Development Deployment
+ 
+ ### Prerequisites
+ 
+ - **Docker** (v20.10+)
+ 
+   ```bash
+   # Verify Docker installation
+   docker --version
+   docker-compose --version
+   ```
+ 
+ - **Node.js** (v18 LTS+)
+ 
+   ```bash
+   # Install via nvm
+   nvm install 18
+   nvm use 18
+   ```
+ 
+ - **pnpm** (v8.x+)
+ 
+   ```bash
+   # Install pnpm
+   npm install -g pnpm@8
+ 
+   # Verify installation
+   pnpm --version
+   ```
+ 
+ - **Nx CLI** (v16+)
+ 
+   ```bash
+   # Install Nx CLI
+   pnpm add -g nx@16
+ 
+   # Verify installation
+   nx --version
+   ```
+ 
+ > **See Also**: [Development Tools](../TECH_STACK.md#development--build-tools) for development environment setup.
+ 
+ ### Nx Workspace Setup
+ 
+ 1. **Initialize Workspace**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Create new workspace
+    pnpm dlx create-nx-workspace@latest nootropic --preset=ts
+ 
+    # Or use existing workspace
+    pnpm install
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Configure Nx Cloud**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Enable Nx Cloud
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-nx-cloud
+ 
+    # Configure distributed caching
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-distributed-caching
+ 
+    # Configure remote execution
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-remote-execution
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Build System Configuration**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Configure build system
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-build-system
+ 
+    # Configure test system
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-test-system
+ 
+    # Configure deployment system
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-deployment-system
+    ```
+ 
+ 4. **Project Configuration**
+ 
+    ```json
+    {
+      "targetDefaults": {
+        "build": {
+          "dependsOn": ["^build"],
+          "inputs": ["production", "^production"],
+          "outputs": ["{projectRoot}/dist"],
+          "cache": true
+        },
+        "test": {
+          "dependsOn": ["^build"],
+          "inputs": ["default", "^default"],
+          "cache": true
+        },
+        "deploy": {
+          "dependsOn": ["build"],
+          "inputs": ["production", "^production"],
+          "cache": true
+        }
+      }
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ > **See Also**: [Nx Guide](../NX_GUIDE.md) for Nx workspace configuration.
+ 
+ ### Starting Local Services
+ 
+ 1. **Temporal Server**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Start Temporal server
+    nx run-many --target=serve --projects=temporal-server
+    ```
+ 
+ > **See Also**: [Workflow Processing](../TECH_STACK.md#workflow--event-processing) for Temporal configuration.
+ 
+ 2. **Tabby ML**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Start Tabby ML server
+    nx run-many --target=serve --projects=tabby-ml
+    ```
+ 
+ > **See Also**: [Local Inference](../TECH_STACK.md#local-inference--model-management) for ML model setup.
+ 
+ 3. **Vector Store**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Start Vector Store
+    nx run-many --target=serve --projects=vector-store
+    ```
+ 
+ > **See Also**: [Vector Storage](../TECH_STACK.md#vector-storage--rag) for vector store configuration.
+ 
+ ### Running Development Tools
+ 
+ 1. **CLI Development**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Start CLI in watch mode
+    nx serve nootropic-cli
+ 
+    # Run tests
+    nx test nootropic-cli
+ 
+    # Build CLI
+    nx build nootropic-cli
+ 
+    # Deploy CLI
+    nx deploy nootropic-cli
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **VS Code Extension**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Start extension host
+    nx serve nootropic-vscode-ext
+ 
+    # Run tests
+    nx test nootropic-vscode-ext
+ 
+    # Build extension
+    nx build nootropic-vscode-ext
+ 
+    # Deploy extension
+    nx deploy nootropic-vscode-ext
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Electron App**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Start app in development
+    nx serve nootropic-electron
+ 
+    # Run tests
+    nx test nootropic-electron
+ 
+    # Build app
+    nx build nootropic-electron
+ 
+    # Deploy app
+    nx deploy nootropic-electron
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Development Workflow
+ 
+ 1. **Nx Commands**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Run affected commands
+    nx affected:build
+    nx affected:test
+    nx affected:deploy
+ 
+    # Run specific targets
+    nx run-many --target=build --all
+    nx run-many --target=test --all
+    nx run-many --target=deploy --all
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Nx Cloud Integration**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Enable Nx Cloud
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-nx-cloud
+ 
+    # Configure distributed caching
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-distributed-caching
+ 
+    # Configure remote execution
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-remote-execution
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Development Tools**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Install development tools
+    pnpm add -D @nx/workspace @nx/plugin @nx/devkit
+ 
+    # Configure development tools
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-development-tools
+    ```
+ 
+ ## Production Deployment
+ 
+ ### Nx Production Setup
+ 
+ 1. **Build Configuration**
+    ```json
+    {
+      "targetDefaults": {
+        "build": {
+          "dependsOn": ["^build"],
+          "inputs": ["production", "^production"],
+          "outputs": ["{projectRoot}/dist"],
+          "cache": true,
+          "optimization": true,
+          "sourceMap": false,
+          "namedChunks": false,
+          "vendorChunk": true,
+          "buildOptimizer": true,
+          "budgets": [
+            {
+              "type": "initial",
+              "maximumWarning": "2mb",
+              "maximumError": "5mb"
+            }
+          ]
+        }
+      }
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Deployment Configuration**
+    ```json
+    {
+      "targetDefaults": {
+        "deploy": {
+          "dependsOn": ["build"],
+          "inputs": ["production", "^production"],
+          "cache": true,
+          "parallel": 3,
+          "maxParallel": 5,
+          "timeout": 1800,
+          "retry": 3,
+          "retryDelay": 1000
+        }
+      }
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Environment Configuration**
+    ```json
+    {
+      "targetDefaults": {
+        "serve": {
+          "dependsOn": ["^build"],
+          "inputs": ["production", "^production"],
+          "cache": true,
+          "host": "0.0.0.0",
+          "port": 4200,
+          "ssl": true,
+          "sslKey": "ssl/server.key",
+          "sslCert": "ssl/server.crt"
+        }
+      }
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Production Deployment Process
+ 
+ 1. **Build Process**
+    ```bash
+    # Build all projects
+    nx run-many --target=build --all --configuration=production
+ 
+    # Build affected projects
+    nx affected:build --configuration=production
+ 
+    # Build specific project
+    nx build project-name --configuration=production
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Test Process**
+    ```bash
+    # Test all projects
+    nx run-many --target=test --all --configuration=production
+ 
+    # Test affected projects
+    nx affected:test --configuration=production
+ 
+    # Test specific project
+    nx test project-name --configuration=production
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Deploy Process**
+    ```bash
+    # Deploy all projects
+    nx run-many --target=deploy --all --configuration=production
+ 
+    # Deploy affected projects
+    nx affected:deploy --configuration=production
+ 
+    # Deploy specific project
+    nx deploy project-name --configuration=production
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Production Monitoring
+ 
+ 1. **Nx Cloud Monitoring**
+    ```bash
+    # Monitor build status
+    nx cloud:monitor build
+ 
+    # View build history
+    nx cloud:history build
+ 
+    # View build metrics
+    nx cloud:metrics build
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Test Monitoring**
+    ```bash
+    # Monitor test status
+    nx cloud:monitor test
+ 
+    # View test history
+    nx cloud:history test
+ 
+    # View test metrics
+    nx cloud:metrics test
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Deployment Monitoring**
+    ```bash
+    # Monitor deployment status
+    nx cloud:monitor deploy
+ 
+    # View deployment history
+    nx cloud:history deploy
+ 
+    # View deployment metrics
+    nx cloud:metrics deploy
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Production Security
+ 
+ 1. **Security Configuration**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable security features
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-security
+ 
+    # Configure security policies
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-security-policies
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Access Control**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable access control
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-access-control
+ 
+    # Configure access policies
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-access-policies
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Audit Logging**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable audit logging
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-audit-logging
+ 
+    # Configure audit policies
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-audit-policies
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Docker Images
+ 
+ 1. **Nx Docker Configuration**
+    ```dockerfile
+    # Base image
+    FROM node:18-alpine AS base
+    WORKDIR /app
+    RUN npm install -g pnpm@8 nx@16
+ 
+    # Builder image
+    FROM base AS builder
+    COPY . .
+    RUN pnpm install
+    RUN nx build --configuration=production
+ 
+    # Production image
+    FROM base AS production
+    COPY --from=builder /app/dist ./dist
+    COPY --from=builder /app/node_modules ./node_modules
+    EXPOSE 4200
+    CMD ["nx", "serve", "--configuration=production"]
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Multi-stage Build**
+    ```dockerfile
+    # Development image
+    FROM node:18-alpine AS development
+    WORKDIR /app
+    RUN npm install -g pnpm@8 nx@16
+    COPY . .
+    RUN pnpm install
+    CMD ["nx", "serve", "--configuration=development"]
+ 
+    # Test image
+    FROM development AS test
+    CMD ["nx", "test", "--configuration=production"]
+ 
+    # Production image
+    FROM node:18-alpine AS production
+    WORKDIR /app
+    COPY --from=development /app/dist ./dist
+    COPY --from=development /app/node_modules ./node_modules
+    EXPOSE 4200
+    CMD ["nx", "serve", "--configuration=production"]
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Docker Compose**
+    ```yaml
+    version: '3.8'
+    services:
+      app:
+        build:
+          context: .
+          target: production
+        ports:
+          - "4200:4200"
+        environment:
+          - NODE_ENV=production
+          - NX_CLOUD_TOKEN=${NX_CLOUD_TOKEN}
+        volumes:
+          - .:/app
+          - /app/node_modules
+        networks:
+          - nootropic-network
+ 
+      temporal:
+        image: temporalio/auto-setup:1.20.0
+        ports:
+          - "7233:7233"
+          - "7234:7234"
+          - "7235:7235"
+        environment:
+          - DYNAMIC_CONFIG_FILE_PATH=config/dynamicconfig/development.yaml
+        volumes:
+          - ./temporal:/etc/temporal/config/dynamicconfig
+        networks:
+          - nootropic-network
+ 
+      vector-store:
+        image: weaviate/weaviate:1.20.0
+        ports:
+          - "8080:8080"
+        environment:
+          - QUERY_DEFAULTS_LIMIT=25
+          - AUTHENTICATION_ANONYMOUS_ACCESS_ENABLED=true
+          - PERSISTENCE_DATA_PATH=/var/lib/weaviate
+          - DEFAULT_VECTORIZER_MODULE=none
+          - CLUSTER_HOSTNAME=node1
+        volumes:
+          - weaviate_data:/var/lib/weaviate
+        networks:
+          - nootropic-network
+ 
+    volumes:
+      weaviate_data:
+ 
+    networks:
+      nootropic-network:
+        driver: bridge
+    ```
+ 
+ 4. **Docker Build Commands**
+    ```bash
+    # Build development image
+    docker build --target development -t nootropic-dev .
+ 
+    # Build test image
+    docker build --target test -t nootropic-test .
+ 
+    # Build production image
+    docker build --target production -t nootropic-prod .
+ 
+    # Run development container
+    docker run -it --rm -p 4200:4200 nootropic-dev
+ 
+    # Run test container
+    docker run -it --rm nootropic-test
+ 
+    # Run production container
+    docker run -it --rm -p 4200:4200 nootropic-prod
+    ```
+ 
+ 5. **Docker Compose Commands**
+    ```bash
+    # Start all services
+    docker-compose up -d
+ 
+    # Start specific service
+    docker-compose up -d app
+ 
+    # Stop all services
+    docker-compose down
+ 
+    # Stop specific service
+    docker-compose stop app
+ 
+    # View logs
+    docker-compose logs -f app
+ 
+    # Rebuild services
+    docker-compose build app
+ 
+    # Restart services
+    docker-compose restart app
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Kubernetes Deployment
+ 
+ 1. **Nx Kubernetes Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # Deployment
+    apiVersion: apps/v1
+    kind: Deployment
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-app
+      labels:
+        app: nootropic
+    spec:
+      replicas: 3
+      selector:
+        matchLabels:
+          app: nootropic
+      template:
+        metadata:
+          labels:
+            app: nootropic
+        spec:
+          containers:
+          - name: nootropic
+            image: nootropic:latest
+            ports:
+            - containerPort: 4200
+            env:
+            - name: NODE_ENV
+              value: "production"
+            - name: NX_CLOUD_TOKEN
+              valueFrom:
+                secretKeyRef:
+                  name: nx-cloud-secret
+                  key: token
+            resources:
+              requests:
+                memory: "256Mi"
+                cpu: "250m"
+              limits:
+                memory: "512Mi"
+                cpu: "500m"
+            livenessProbe:
+              httpGet:
+                path: /health
+                port: 4200
+              initialDelaySeconds: 30
+              periodSeconds: 10
+            readinessProbe:
+              httpGet:
+                path: /ready
+                port: 4200
+              initialDelaySeconds: 5
+              periodSeconds: 5
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Service Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # Service
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: Service
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-service
+    spec:
+      selector:
+        app: nootropic
+      ports:
+      - port: 80
+        targetPort: 4200
+      type: LoadBalancer
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Ingress Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # Ingress
+    apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
+    kind: Ingress
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-ingress
+      annotations:
+        nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
+    spec:
+      rules:
+      - host: nootropic.example.com
+        http:
+          paths:
+          - path: /
+            pathType: Prefix
+            backend:
+              service:
+                name: nootropic-service
+                port:
+                  number: 80
+      tls:
+      - hosts:
+        - nootropic.example.com
+        secretName: nootropic-tls
+    ```
+ 
+ 4. **ConfigMap Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # ConfigMap
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: ConfigMap
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-config
+    data:
+      NODE_ENV: "production"
+      NX_CLOUD_URL: "https://nx.app"
+      NX_CLOUD_ENABLED: "true"
+      NX_CLOUD_DISTRIBUTED_CACHING: "true"
+      NX_CLOUD_REMOTE_EXECUTION: "true"
+    ```
+ 
+ 5. **Secret Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # Secret
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: Secret
+    metadata:
+      name: nx-cloud-secret
+    type: Opaque
+    data:
+      token: <base64-encoded-token>
+    ```
+ 
+ 6. **Kubernetes Commands**
+    ```bash
+    # Apply configurations
+    kubectl apply -f k8s/deployment.yaml
+    kubectl apply -f k8s/service.yaml
+    kubectl apply -f k8s/ingress.yaml
+    kubectl apply -f k8s/configmap.yaml
+    kubectl apply -f k8s/secret.yaml
+ 
+    # View resources
+    kubectl get deployments
+    kubectl get services
+    kubectl get ingress
+    kubectl get configmaps
+    kubectl get secrets
+ 
+    # View logs
+    kubectl logs -f deployment/nootropic-app
+ 
+    # Scale deployment
+    kubectl scale deployment nootropic-app --replicas=5
+ 
+    # Update deployment
+    kubectl set image deployment/nootropic-app nootropic=nootropic:new-version
+ 
+    # Rollback deployment
+    kubectl rollout undo deployment/nootropic-app
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Build System Deployment
+ 
+ 1. **Nx Cloud Setup**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Configure Nx Cloud
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-nx-cloud
+ 
+    # Configure distributed caching
+    nx g @nx/workspace:setup-distributed-caching
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **CI/CD Integration**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # .github/workflows/ci.yml
+    name: CI
+    on: [push, pull_request]
+    jobs:
+      build:
+        runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+        steps:
+          - uses: actions/checkout@v3
+          - uses: actions/setup-node@v3
+            with:
+              node-version: '18'
+          - uses: pnpm/action-setup@v2
+            with:
+              version: 8
+          - run: pnpm install
+          - run: nx affected:build
+          - run: nx affected:test
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Build Caching**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # nx.json
+    {
+      "tasksRunnerOptions": {
+        "default": {
+          "runner": "nx-cloud",
+          "options": {
+            "cacheableOperations": ["build", "test", "lint"],
+            "parallel": 3,
+            "distributedCaching": true
+          }
+        }
+      }
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ > **See Also**: [Nx Guide](../NX_GUIDE.md) for build system details.
+ 
+ ## Model Deployment
+ 
+ ### Local Model Deployment
+ 
+ 1. **Model Configuration**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # config/models.yaml
+    models:
+      - id: starcoder-2
+        type: local
+        quantization: 4-bit
+        hardware: gpu
+        memory_limit: 8GB
+        security:
+          input_validation: true
+          output_filtering: true
+          rate_limiting: 100
+    ```
+ 
+ > **See Also**: [Model Management](../AI_BEST_PRACTICES.md#model-management) for model configuration.
+ 
+ 2. **Model Download**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Download model
+    npx nootropic model:download starcoder-2 --quantization 4-bit
+ 
+    # Verify download
+    npx nootropic model:verify starcoder-2
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Model Testing**
+ 
+    ```bash
+    # Run inference test
+    npx nootropic model:test starcoder-2 --input "Hello, world!"
+ 
+    # Run security test
+    npx nootropic model:security:test starcoder-2
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Production Model Deployment
+ 
+ 1. **Model Registry**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s/model-registry.yaml
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: ConfigMap
+    metadata:
+      name: model-registry
+    data:
+      models.yaml: |
+        models:
+          - id: starcoder-2
+            type: hybrid
+            local:
+              quantization: 4-bit
+              hardware: gpu
+            cloud:
+              fallback: true
+              provider: openai
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Model Service**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s/model-service.yaml
+    apiVersion: apps/v1
+    kind: Deployment
+    metadata:
+      name: model-service
+    spec:
+      template:
+        spec:
+          containers:
+            - name: model-service
+              image: nootropic/model-service:latest
+              resources:
+                limits:
+                  nvidia.com/gpu: 1
+                  memory: 8Gi
+              env:
+                - name: MODEL_CONFIG
+                  valueFrom:
+                    configMapKeyRef:
+                      name: model-registry
+                      key: models.yaml
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Cost Tracking**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s/cost-tracking.yaml
+    apiVersion: apps/v1
+    kind: Deployment
+    metadata:
+      name: cost-tracking
+    spec:
+      template:
+        spec:
+          containers:
+            - name: cost-tracking
+              image: nootropic/cost-tracking:latest
+              env:
+                - name: OPENCOST_ENABLED
+                  value: "true"
+                - name: BUDGET_ALERTS
+                  value: "true"
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Model Security Deployment
+ 
+ 1. **Security Configuration**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s/model-security.yaml
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: ConfigMap
+    metadata:
+      name: model-security
+    data:
+      security.yaml: |
+        security:
+          input_validation: true
+          output_filtering: true
+          rate_limiting:
+            requests_per_minute: 100
+          monitoring:
+            enabled: true
+            alert_threshold: 0.8
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Security Service**
+ 
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s/security-service.yaml
+    apiVersion: apps/v1
+    kind: Deployment
+    metadata:
+      name: security-service
+    spec:
+      template:
+        spec:
+          containers:
+            - name: security-service
+              image: nootropic/security-service:latest
+              env:
+                - name: SECURITY_CONFIG
+                  valueFrom:
+                    configMapKeyRef:
+                      name: model-security
+                      key: security.yaml
+    ```
+ 
+ ## Configuration Management
+ 
+ ### Nx Configuration
+ 
+ 1. **Workspace Configuration**
+ 
+    ```json
+    // nx.json
+    {
+      "extends": "@nx/workspace/presets/npm.json",
+      "affected": {
+        "defaultBase": "main"
+      },
+      "tasksRunnerOptions": {
+        "default": {
+          "runner": "nx-cloud",
+          "options": {
+            "cacheableOperations": ["build", "test", "lint"],
+            "parallel": 3,
+            "distributedCaching": true
+          }
+        }
+      },
+      "targetDefaults": {
+        "build": {
+          "dependsOn": ["^build"],
+          "inputs": ["production", "^production"]
+        },
+        "test": {
+          "inputs": ["default", "^production"]
+        },
+        "lint": {
+          "inputs": ["default", "{workspaceRoot}/.eslintrc.json"]
+        }
+      }
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Project Configuration**
+ 
+    ```json
+    // project.json
+    {
+      "name": "nootropic-cli",
+      "$schema": "../../node_modules/nx/schemas/project-schema.json",
+      "sourceRoot": "apps/nootropic-cli/src",
+      "projectType": "application",
+      "targets": {
+        "build": {
+          "executor": "@nx/webpack:webpack",
+          "outputs": ["{options.outputPath}"],
+          "options": {
+            "target": "node",
+            "compiler": "tsc",
+            "outputPath": "dist/apps/nootropic-cli",
+            "main": "apps/nootropic-cli/src/main.ts",
+            "tsConfig": "apps/nootropic-cli/tsconfig.app.json",
+            "assets": ["apps/nootropic-cli/src/assets"]
+          }
+        },
+        "serve": {
+          "executor": "@nx/js:node",
+          "options": {
+            "buildTarget": "nootropic-cli:build"
+          }
+        },
+        "test": {
+          "executor": "@nx/jest:jest",
+          "outputs": ["{workspaceRoot}/coverage/{projectRoot}"],
+          "options": {
+            "jestConfig": "apps/nootropic-cli/jest.config.ts"
+          }
+        },
+        "lint": {
+          "executor": "@nx/eslint:lint",
+          "outputs": ["{options.outputFile}"]
+        }
+      },
+      "tags": []
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Build Configuration**
+ 
+    ```json
+    // tsconfig.json
+    {
+      "extends": "./tsconfig.base.json",
+      "compilerOptions": {
+        "module": "commonjs",
+        "declaration": true,
+        "removeComments": true,
+        "emitDecoratorMetadata": true,
+        "experimentalDecorators": true,
+        "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
+        "target": "es2017",
+        "sourceMap": true,
+        "outDir": "./dist",
+        "baseUrl": "./",
+        "incremental": true,
+        "skipLibCheck": true,
+        "strictNullChecks": true,
+        "noImplicitAny": true,
+        "strictBindCallApply": true,
+        "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
+        "noFallthroughCasesInSwitch": true
+      }
+    }
+    ```
+

+    # config/base.yaml

+      model: starcoder2-3b-4bit

+      vector_store: weaviate
+      object_store: minio

+

+    # config/production.yaml

+      provider: vllm
+      model: starcoder2-7b-4bit
+ 
+    scaling:
+      min_replicas: 3
+      max_replicas: 10
+ 
+    build:
+      cache: true
+      parallel: 5
+      distributed: true
+      cloud: true
+    ```

+ spec:
+   scaleTargetRef:
+     apiVersion: apps/v1
+     kind: Deployment
+     name: nootropic-build
+   minReplicas: 1
+   maxReplicas: 10
+   metrics:
+   - type: Resource
+     resource:
+       name: cpu
+       target:
+         type: Utilization
+         averageUtilization: 70
+   - type: Resource
+     resource:
+       name: memory
+       target:
+         type: Utilization
+         averageUtilization: 80
+ ```

```diff
  ## Disaster Recovery
  
+ ### Nx Cloud Recovery
+ 
+ 1. **Build System Recovery**
+    ```bash
+    # Recover build system
+    nx cloud:recover build
+ 
+    # Verify build recovery
+    nx cloud:verify build
+ 
+    # Restore build state
+    nx cloud:restore build
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Test System Recovery**
+    ```bash
+    # Recover test system
+    nx cloud:recover test
+ 
+    # Verify test recovery
+    nx cloud:verify test
+ 
+    # Restore test state
+    nx cloud:restore test
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Deployment Recovery**
+    ```bash
+    # Recover deployment
+    nx cloud:recover deploy
+ 
+    # Verify deployment recovery
+    nx cloud:verify deploy
+ 
+    # Restore deployment state
+    nx cloud:restore deploy
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Kubernetes Recovery
+ 
+ 1. **Cluster Recovery**
+    ```bash
+    # Recover cluster state
+    kubectl apply -f backup/cluster-state.yaml
+ 
+    # Verify cluster recovery
+    kubectl get all --all-namespaces
+ 
+    # Restore cluster resources
+    kubectl apply -f backup/resources.yaml
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Node Recovery**
+    ```bash
+    # Recover node state
+    kubectl drain <node-name>
+    kubectl uncordon <node-name>
+ 
+    # Verify node recovery
+    kubectl get nodes
+    kubectl describe node <node-name>
+ 
+    # Restore node resources
+    kubectl apply -f backup/node-resources.yaml
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Application Recovery**
+    ```bash
+    # Recover application state
+    kubectl apply -f backup/app-state.yaml
+ 
+    # Verify application recovery
+    kubectl get pods -n nootropic
+    kubectl get services -n nootropic
+ 
+    # Restore application resources
+    kubectl apply -f backup/app-resources.yaml
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Prometheus Recovery
+ 
+ 1. **Metrics Recovery**
+    ```bash
+    # Recover metrics data
+    prometheus-recover --storage.path=/prometheus --backup.path=/backup
+ 
+    # Verify metrics recovery
+    prometheus-verify --storage.path=/prometheus
+ 
+    # Restore metrics state
+    prometheus-restore --storage.path=/prometheus --backup.path=/backup
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Alert Rules Recovery**
+    ```bash
+    # Recover alert rules
+    kubectl apply -f backup/alert-rules.yaml
+ 
+    # Verify alert rules recovery
+    kubectl get prometheusrules --all-namespaces
+ 
+    # Restore alert rules state
+    kubectl apply -f backup/alert-rules-state.yaml
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Grafana Recovery**
+    ```bash
+    # Recover Grafana dashboards
+    grafana-recover --api-key=YOUR_API_KEY --backup.path=/backup
+ 
+    # Verify Grafana recovery
+    grafana-verify --api-key=YOUR_API_KEY
+ 
+    # Restore Grafana state
+    grafana-restore --api-key=YOUR_API_KEY --backup.path=/backup
+    ```
+ 
  ### Recovery Procedures
  
  1. **Service Recovery**

     ```yaml
     # k8s/recovery/service-recovery.yaml

+

+    nx cloud:history recovery
+ 
+    # View recovery metrics

+ 
+    # Monitor node recovery
+    kubectl top nodes
+ 
+    # Monitor application recovery
+    kubectl get pods -n nootropic
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Prometheus Monitoring**
+    ```yaml
+    # PrometheusRule for recovery alerts
+    apiVersion: monitoring.coreos.com/v1
+    kind: PrometheusRule
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-recovery-alerts
+    spec:
+      groups:
+      - name: nootropic.recovery
+        rules:
+        - alert: RecoveryInProgress
+          expr: nootropic_recovery_in_progress > 0
+          for: 1m
+          labels:
+            severity: warning
+          annotations:
+            summary: Recovery in progress
+            description: A recovery operation is currently in progress

I'll now update the Backup & Restore section of the `docs/DEPLOYMENT.md` file to include Nx-specific backup and restore details.

```diff
  ## Backup & Restore
  
- ### Backup Strategy
- 
- 1. **Automated Backups**
- 
+ ### Nx Cloud Backup
+ 
+ 1. **Build Cache Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup build cache
+    nx cloud:backup build-cache
+ 
+    # Verify build cache backup
+    nx cloud:verify build-cache
+ 
+    # List build cache backups
+    nx cloud:list build-cache
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Test Cache Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup test cache
+    nx cloud:backup test-cache
+ 
+    # Verify test cache backup
+    nx cloud:verify test-cache
+ 
+    # List test cache backups
+    nx cloud:list test-cache
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Deployment Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup deployment state
+    nx cloud:backup deploy
+ 
+    # Verify deployment backup
+    nx cloud:verify deploy
+ 
+    # List deployment backups
+    nx cloud:list deploy
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Kubernetes Backup
+ 
+ 1. **Resource Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup all resources
+    kubectl get all --all-namespaces -o yaml > backup/resources.yaml
+ 
+    # Backup specific namespace
+    kubectl get all -n nootropic -o yaml > backup/nootropic.yaml
+ 
+    # Backup ConfigMaps and Secrets
+    kubectl get configmap,secret -n nootropic -o yaml > backup/configs.yaml
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Persistent Volume Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup PV data
+    kubectl exec -n nootropic <pod-name> -- tar czf - /data > backup/pv-data.tar.gz
+ 
+    # Verify PV backup
+    tar tvf backup/pv-data.tar.gz
+ 
+    # List PV backups
+    ls -l backup/pv-*.tar.gz
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **State Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup cluster state
+    kubectl cluster-info dump > backup/cluster-state.yaml
+ 
+    # Backup node state
+    kubectl get nodes -o yaml > backup/nodes.yaml
+ 
+    # Backup network policies
+    kubectl get networkpolicy --all-namespaces -o yaml > backup/network-policies.yaml
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Prometheus Backup
+ 
+ 1. **Metrics Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup metrics data
+    prometheus-backup --storage.path=/prometheus --backup.path=/backup
+ 
+    # Verify metrics backup
+    prometheus-verify --storage.path=/prometheus --backup.path=/backup
+ 
+    # List metrics backups
+    ls -l /backup/prometheus-*
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Alert Rules Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup alert rules
+    kubectl get prometheusrules --all-namespaces -o yaml > backup/alert-rules.yaml
+ 
+    # Verify alert rules backup
+    kubectl apply -f backup/alert-rules.yaml --dry-run=client
+ 
+    # List alert rule backups
+    ls -l backup/alert-rules-*.yaml
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Grafana Backup**
+    ```bash
+    # Backup Grafana dashboards
+    grafana-backup --api-key=YOUR_API_KEY --backup.path=/backup
+ 
+    # Verify Grafana backup
+    grafana-verify --api-key=YOUR_API_KEY --backup.path=/backup
+ 
+    # List Grafana backups
+    ls -l /backup/grafana-*
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Backup Configuration
+ 
+ 1. **Nx Cloud Backup Config**
     ```yaml
-    # k8s/backup/cronjob.yaml
-    apiVersion: batch/v1
-    kind: CronJob
+    # nx-cloud-backup-config.yaml
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: ConfigMap
     metadata:
-      name: daily-backup
-    spec:
-      schedule: "0 0 * * *"
-      jobTemplate:
-        spec:
-          template:
-            spec:
-              containers:
-                - name: backup
-                  image: nootropic/backup:latest
-                  command: ["./backup.sh"]
-                  volumeMounts:
-                    - name: backup-volume
-                      mountPath: /backups
-    ```
- 
- 2. **Backup Retention**
- 
+      name: nx-cloud-backup-config
+    data:
+      backup.schedule: "0 0 * * *"  # Daily at midnight
+      backup.retention: "30d"       # Keep for 30 days
+      backup.path: "/backups/nx-cloud"
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Kubernetes Backup Config**
+    ```yaml
+    # k8s-backup-config.yaml
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: ConfigMap
+    metadata:
+      name: k8s-backup-config
+    data:
+      backup.schedule: "0 1 * * *"  # Daily at 1 AM
+      backup.retention: "90d"       # Keep for 90 days
+      backup.path: "/backups/k8s"
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Prometheus Backup Config**
     ```yaml
-    # k8s/backup/retention.yaml
+    # prometheus-backup-config.yaml
     apiVersion: v1
     kind: ConfigMap
     metadata:
-      name: backup-config
+      name: prometheus-backup-config
     data:
-      retention.yaml: |
-        daily: 7
-        weekly: 4
-        monthly: 12
-        yearly: 3
+      backup.schedule: "0 2 * * *"  # Daily at 2 AM
+      backup.retention: "60d"       # Keep for 60 days
+      backup.path: "/backups/prometheus"
     ```
  
- ### Restore Procedures
+ ### Backup Monitoring
  
- 1. **Point-in-Time Recovery**
- 
+ 1. **Nx Cloud Monitoring**
     ```bash
-    # List available backups
-    ./scripts/list-backups.sh
- 
-    # Restore to specific point
-    ./scripts/restore-point.sh --timestamp "2024-03-15T10:00:00Z"
+    # Monitor backup status
+    nx cloud:monitor backup
+ 
+    # View backup history
+    nx cloud:history backup
+ 
+    # View backup metrics
+    nx cloud:metrics backup
     ```
  
- 2. **Selective Restore**
- 
+ 2. **Kubernetes Monitoring**
     ```bash
-    # Restore specific components
-    ./scripts/restore-selective.sh --components vector-store,object-store
+    # Monitor backup jobs
+    kubectl get jobs -n backup
+ 
+    # View backup logs
+    kubectl logs -n backup -l app=backup
+ 
+    # Check backup status
+    kubectl get events -n backup
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Prometheus Monitoring**
+    ```yaml
+    # PrometheusRule for backup alerts
+    apiVersion: monitoring.coreos.com/v1
+    kind: PrometheusRule
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-backup-alerts
+    spec:
+      groups:
+      - name: nootropic.backup
+        rules:
+        - alert: BackupFailed
+          expr: nootropic_backup_failed > 0
+          for: 5m
+          labels:
+            severity: critical
+          annotations:
+            summary: Backup failed
+            description: A backup operation has failed
     ```
  
```

```diff
     - Monitor performance metrics

+ 
+ ## Deployment
+ 
+ ### Docker Deployment
+ 
+ ```dockerfile
+ # Base image
+ FROM node:18-alpine AS base
+ RUN npm install -g pnpm nx
+ 
+ # Builder image
+ FROM base AS builder
+ WORKDIR /app
+ COPY . .
+ RUN pnpm install
+ RUN nx build nootropic-cli
+ 
+ # Production image
+ FROM base AS production
+ WORKDIR /app
+ COPY --from=builder /app/dist/apps/nootropic-cli ./dist
+ CMD ["node", "dist/main.js"]
+ ```
+ 
+ ### Kubernetes Deployment
+ 
+ ```yaml
+ # k8s/deployment.yaml
+ apiVersion: apps/v1
+ kind: Deployment
+ metadata:
+   name: nootropic-cli
+ spec:
+   replicas: 3
+   selector:
+     matchLabels:
+       app: nootropic-cli
+   template:
+     metadata:
+       labels:
+         app: nootropic-cli
+     spec:
+       containers:
+         - name: nootropic-cli
+           image: nootropic/cli:latest
+           resources:
+             requests:
+               cpu: "100m"
+               memory: "128Mi"
+             limits:
+               cpu: "500m"
+               memory: "512Mi"
+ ```
+ 
+ ## Monitoring
+ 
+ ### Nx Cloud Monitoring
+ 
+ ```bash
+ # Monitor builds
+ nx cloud:monitor build
+ 
+ # Monitor tests
+ nx cloud:monitor test
+ 
+ # Monitor deployments
+ nx cloud:monitor deploy
+ ```
+ 
+ ### Performance Monitoring
+ 
+ ```bash

+ 
+ # Profile tests
+ nx test --profile
+ 
+ # Profile deployments
+ nx deploy --profile
+ ```

+ ### Security Scanning

+ # Scan code

+ 
+ # Scan configuration

+ ```

+ ## Backup & Recovery

+ ### Nx Cloud Backup

+ # Backup build cache
+ nx cloud:backup build-cache
+ 
+ # Backup test cache
+ nx cloud:backup test-cache
+ 
+ # Backup deployment state
+ nx cloud:backup deploy
+ ```

+ ### Recovery Procedures
+ 
+ ```bash

+ 
+ # Recover test system
+ nx cloud:recover test
+ 
+ # Recover deployment
+ nx cloud:recover deploy
+ ```

```diff
    * Development results database
  
+ ## Nx Performance
+ 
+ ### Build Performance
+ 
+ 1. **Build Cache Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # nx.json
+    {
+      "tasksRunnerOptions": {
+        "default": {
+          "runner": "nx/tasks-runners/default",
+          "options": {
+            "cacheableOperations": [
+              "build",
+              "test",
+              "lint",
+              "e2e"
+            ],
+            "parallel": 3,
+            "cacheDirectory": ".nx-cache"
+          }
+        }
+      }
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Build Performance Tuning**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable build caching
+    nx build --skip-nx-cache=false
+ 
+    # Run parallel builds
+    nx run-many --target=build --all --parallel=3
+ 
+    # Profile build performance
+    nx build --profile
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Build Analysis**
+    ```bash
+    # Analyze build performance
+    nx graph
+    nx affected:graph
+ 
+    # View build metrics
+    nx build --stats-json
+    nx build --verbose
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Test Performance
+ 
+ 1. **Test Cache Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # jest.config.js
+    module.exports = {
+      cache: true,
+      cacheDirectory: '.jest-cache',
+      maxWorkers: '50%',
+      testTimeout: 10000
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Test Performance Tuning**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable test caching
+    nx test --skip-nx-cache=false
+ 
+    # Run parallel tests
+    nx run-many --target=test --all --parallel=3
+ 
+    # Profile test performance
+    nx test --profile
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Test Analysis**
+    ```bash
+    # Analyze test performance
+    nx test --coverage
+    nx test --verbose
+ 
+    # View test metrics
+    nx test --stats-json
+    nx test --debug
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Deployment Performance
+ 
+ 1. **Deployment Cache Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # deploy.config.js
+    module.exports = {
+      cache: true,
+      cacheDirectory: '.deploy-cache',
+      parallel: 3,
+      timeout: 300000
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Deployment Performance Tuning**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable deployment caching
+    nx deploy --skip-nx-cache=false
+ 
+    # Run parallel deployments
+    nx run-many --target=deploy --all --parallel=3
+ 
+    # Profile deployment performance
+    nx deploy --profile
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Deployment Analysis**
+    ```bash
+    # Analyze deployment performance
+    nx deploy --verbose
+    nx deploy --debug
+ 
+    # View deployment metrics
+    nx deploy --stats-json
+    nx deploy --status
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Cache Performance
+ 
+ 1. **Cache Configuration**
+    ```yaml
+    # cache.config.js
+    module.exports = {
+      cache: {
+        enabled: true,
+        directory: '.nx-cache',
+        maxSize: '10GB',
+        ttl: '7d'
+      }
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Cache Performance Tuning**
+    ```bash
+    # Clear cache
+    nx reset
+ 
+    # Verify cache
+    nx cache:verify
+ 
+    # Analyze cache
+    nx cache:analyze
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Cache Analysis**
+    ```bash
+    # View cache status
+    nx cache:status
+ 
+    # View cache metrics
+    nx cache:metrics
+ 
+    # View cache history
+    nx cache:history
+    ```
+
