+    ```yaml
+    # Grafana dashboard for deployment analysis
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: ConfigMap
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-deploy-analysis
+    data:
+      dashboard.json: |
+        {
+          "panels": [
+            {
+              "title": "Deployment Duration",
+              "type": "graph",
+              "datasource": "Prometheus",
+              "targets": [
+                {
+                  "expr": "rate(nootropic_deploy_duration_seconds[5m])",
+                  "legendFormat": "Deployment Duration"
+                }
+              ]
+            },
+            {
+              "title": "Deployment Success Rate",
+              "type": "gauge",
+              "datasource": "Prometheus",
+              "targets": [
+                {
+                  "expr": "nootropic_deploy_success_rate",
+                  "legendFormat": "Success Rate"
+                }
+              ]
+            }
+          ]
+        }
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Deployment Alert Metrics**
+    ```yaml
+    # PrometheusRule for deployment metrics
+    apiVersion: monitoring.coreos.com/v1
+    kind: PrometheusRule
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-deploy-metrics
+    spec:
+      groups:
+      - name: nootropic.deploy
+        rules:
+        - alert: HighDeploymentDuration
+          expr: rate(nootropic_deploy_duration_seconds[5m]) > 600
+          for: 5m
+          labels:
+            severity: warning
+          annotations:
+            summary: High deployment duration
+            description: Deployment duration is above 10 minutes
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Cache Metrics
+ 
+ 1. **Cache Performance Metrics**
+    ```yaml
+    # Prometheus metrics for cache
+    apiVersion: monitoring.coreos.com/v1
+    kind: ServiceMonitor
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-cache-metrics
+    spec:
+      endpoints:
+      - port: metrics
+        path: /metrics
+        interval: 15s
+      selector:
+        matchLabels:
+          app: nootropic-cache
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Cache Analysis Metrics**
+    ```yaml
+    # Grafana dashboard for cache analysis
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: ConfigMap
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-cache-analysis
+    data:
+      dashboard.json: |
+        {
+          "panels": [
+            {
+              "title": "Cache Hit Rate",
+              "type": "graph",
+              "datasource": "Prometheus",
+              "targets": [
+                {
+                  "expr": "rate(nootropic_cache_hits_total[5m]) / rate(nootropic_cache_requests_total[5m])",
+                  "legendFormat": "Hit Rate"
+                }
+              ]
+            },
+            {
+              "title": "Cache Size",
+              "type": "gauge",
+              "datasource": "Prometheus",
+              "targets": [
+                {
+                  "expr": "nootropic_cache_size_bytes",
+                  "legendFormat": "Size"
+                }
+              ]
+            }
+          ]
+        }
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Cache Alert Metrics**
+    ```yaml
+    # PrometheusRule for cache metrics
+    apiVersion: monitoring.coreos.com/v1
+    kind: PrometheusRule
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-cache-metrics
+    spec:
+      groups:
+      - name: nootropic.cache
+        rules:
+        - alert: LowCacheHitRate
+          expr: rate(nootropic_cache_hits_total[5m]) / rate(nootropic_cache_requests_total[5m]) < 0.8
+          for: 5m
+          labels:
+            severity: warning
+          annotations:
+            summary: Low cache hit rate
+            description: Cache hit rate is below 80%
+    ``` 
```

+ ### Build Analytics
+ 
+ 1. **Build Performance Analytics**
+    ```yaml
+    # Nx Cloud analytics configuration
+    apiVersion: v1
+    kind: ConfigMap
+    metadata:
+      name: nootropic-build-analytics
+    data:
+      analytics.json: |
+        {
+          "metrics": [
+            {
+              "name": "build_duration",
+              "type": "histogram",
+              "labels": ["project", "target", "configuration"]
+            },
+            {
+              "name": "build_success_rate",
+              "type": "gauge",
+              "labels": ["project", "target", "configuration"]
+            },
+            {
+              "name": "build_cache_hits",
+              "type": "counter",
+              "labels": ["project", "target", "configuration"]
+            }
+          ],
+          "alerts": [
+            {
+              "name": "high_build_duration",
+              "condition": "build_duration > 300",
+              "severity": "warning"
+            },
+            {
+              "name": "low_success_rate",
+              "condition": "build_success_rate < 0.9",
+              "severity": "error"
+            }
+          ]
+        }
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Build Trend Analytics**
+    ```yaml
+    # Grafana dashboard for build trends

+      name: nootropic-build-trends
+    data:
+      dashboard.json: |
+        {
+          "panels": [
+            {
+              "title": "Build Duration Trend",
+              "type": "graph",
+              "datasource": "Prometheus",
+              "targets": [

+                  "expr": "rate(nootropic_build_duration_seconds[1h])",
+                  "legendFormat": "{{project}} - {{target}}"
+                }
+              ]
+            },
+            {

- ## Common Issues and Solutions
- 
- ### Installation Issues
- 
- #### Node.js Version Mismatch
- **Symptoms:**
- - Installation fails
- - Version compatibility errors
- - Module not found errors
- 
- **Solutions:**
- 1. Verify Node.js version:
+   - [Inference Issues](#inference-issues)
+   - [Quality Issues](#quality-issues)
+   - [Resource Issues](#resource-issues)
+ - [Troubleshooting Best Practices](#troubleshooting-best-practices)
+   - [Issue Identification](#issue-identification)
+   - [Issue Resolution](#issue-resolution)
+   - [Issue Prevention](#issue-prevention)
+ 
+ ## Nx Issues
+ 
+ ### Build Issues
+ 
+ 1. **Build Performance Issues**
+    ```bash
+    # Reset Nx cache
+    nx reset
+    
+    # Clean Nx cache
+    nx cache clean
+    
+    # Check cache status
+    nx cache status
+    
+    # View project graph
+    nx graph
+    
+    # View affected graph
+    nx affected:graph
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Build Configuration Issues**
     ```bash
-    node --version
-    ```
- 2. Install correct version (v18 or later):
+    # Validate workspace
+    nx validate-workspace
+    
+    # Check project configuration
+    nx show project <project-name>
+    
+    # Check target configuration
+    nx show target <project-name>:<target-name>
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Build Error Issues**
     ```bash
-    nvm install 18
-    nvm use 18
-    ```
- 3. Clear npm cache:
+    # Fix build errors
+    nx build --fix
+    
+    # Show verbose output
+    nx build --verbose
+    
+    # Show debug output
+    nx build --debug
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Test Issues
+ 
+ 1. **Test Performance Issues**
     ```bash
-    npm cache clean --force
-    ```
- 
- > **See Also**: [Development Tools](../TECH_STACK.md#development--build-tools) for development environment setup.
- 
- #### Python Dependencies
- **Symptoms:**
- - Tabby ML installation fails
- - Python module not found
- - Version compatibility errors
- 
- **Solutions:**
- 1. Verify Python version:
+    # Skip cache for tests
+    nx test --skip-nx-cache
+    
+    # Show test coverage
+    nx test --coverage
+    
+    # Show debug output
+    nx test --debug
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Test Configuration Issues**
+    ```bash
+    # Use specific config
+    nx test --config=jest.config.js
+    
+    # Use specific test file
+    nx test --testFile=test.spec.ts
+    
+    # Use specific test pattern
+    nx test --testPattern=test.*
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Test Error Issues**
     ```bash
-    python --version
-    ```
- 2. Install correct version (v3.9 or later):
+    # Fix test errors
+    nx test --fix
+    
+    # Show verbose output
+    nx test --verbose
+    
+    # Show debug output
+    nx test --debug
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Deployment Issues
+ 
+ 1. **Deployment Performance Issues**
     ```bash
-    pyenv install 3.9
-    pyenv global 3.9
-    ```
- 3. Create and activate virtual environment:
+    # Skip cache for deployment
+    nx deploy --skip-nx-cache
+    
+    # Show deployment status
+    nx deploy --status
+    
+    # Show debug output
+    nx deploy --debug
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Deployment Configuration Issues**
     ```bash
-    python -m venv venv
-    source venv/bin/activate  # or `venv\Scripts\activate` on Windows
-    ```
- 4. Install dependencies:
+    # Use specific config
+    nx deploy --config=deploy.config.js
+    
+    # Use specific environment
+    nx deploy --env=production
+    
+    # Use specific target
+    nx deploy --target=production
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Deployment Error Issues**
     ```bash
-    pip install -r requirements.txt
-    ```
- 
- > **See Also**: [Local Inference](../TECH_STACK.md#local-inference--model-management) for ML setup.
- 
- #### Docker Issues

- - Container fails to start
- - Port conflicts
- - Permission errors
- 
- **Solutions:**
- 1. Check Docker status:
+    # Fix deployment errors
+    nx deploy --fix

+    # Show verbose output

+    nx deploy --debug

+ ### Cache Issues

+    # Reset cache

+    
+    # Clean cache

+    
+    # Check cache status

     ```
- 2. Verify port availability:
+ 
+ 2. **Cache Configuration Issues**
     ```bash
-    lsof -i :<port>
+    # Show cache configuration
+    nx cache:show
+    
+    # Update cache configuration
+    nx cache:update
+    
+    # Validate cache configuration
+    nx cache:validate
     ```
- 3. Fix permissions:
+ 
+ 3. **Cache Error Issues**
     ```bash
-    sudo chown $USER:$USER ~/.docker
-    ```
- 
- > **See Also**: [Docker Configuration](../DEPLOYMENT.md#docker-images) for container setup.
- 
- ### Development Issues
- 
- #### ESM/NodeNext Import Errors
- **Symptoms:**
- - Module not found
- - Import/export errors
- - TypeScript compilation errors
- 
- **Solutions:**
- 1. Check `package.json`:
-    ```json
-    {
-      "type": "module"
-    }
-    ```
- 2. Verify `tsconfig.json`:
-    ```json
-    {
-      "compilerOptions": {
-        "module": "NodeNext",
-        "moduleResolution": "NodeNext"
-      }
-    }
-    ```
- 3. Use explicit extensions:
-    ```typescript
-    import { something } from './file.js';
-    ```
- 
- > **See Also**: [Development Tools](../TECH_STACK.md#development--build-tools) for build configuration.
- 
- #### Test Failures
- **Symptoms:**
- - Missing test functions
- - Test environment errors
- - Coverage issues
- 
- **Solutions:**
- 1. Check Jest configuration:
-    ```typescript
-    // jest.config.ts
-    export default {
-      displayName: 'nootropic-cli',
-      preset: '../../jest.preset.js',
-      testEnvironment: 'node',
-      transform: {
-        '^.+\\.[tj]s$': ['ts-jest', { tsconfig: '<rootDir>/tsconfig.spec.json' }]
-      },
-      moduleFileExtensions: ['ts', 'js', 'html'],
-      coverageDirectory: '../../coverage/apps/nootropic-cli',
-      collectCoverageFrom: [
-        'src/**/*.{ts,tsx}',
-        '!src/**/*.spec.{ts,tsx}',
-        '!src/**/*.test.{ts,tsx}',
-        '!src/**/*.e2e.{ts,tsx}'
-      ],
-      coverageThreshold: {
-        global: {
-          branches: 80,
-          functions: 80,
-          lines: 80,
-          statements: 80
-        }
-      }
-    };
-    ```
- 2. Add test suite:
-    ```typescript
-    import { describe, it, expect } from '@jest/globals';
- 
-    describe('MyComponent', () => {
-      it('should work', () => {
-        expect(true).toBe(true);
-      });
-    });
-    ```
- 3. Run tests with coverage:
+    # Fix cache errors
+    nx cache:fix
+    
+    # Show verbose output
+    nx cache:verbose
+    
+    # Show debug output
+    nx cache:debug
+    ```
+

+

- > **See Also**: [Testing & Quality](../TECH_STACK.md#testing--quality) for testing guidelines.

- #### Mac Resource Fork Files
- **Symptoms:**

- - `Unexpected \x00` errors
- - Test failures
- 
- **Solutions:**
- 1. Remove resource fork files:
+    # Check performance alerts

+    
+    # Configure performance alerts
+    ./scripts/configure-performance.sh
+    
+    # Test performance alerts
+    ./scripts/test-performance.sh
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Health Issues
+ 
+ 1. **Health Monitoring**
     ```bash
-    find . -name '._*' -delete
+    # Monitor system health
+    ./scripts/monitor-health.sh
+    
+    # Monitor application health
+    ./scripts/monitor-app-health.sh
+    
+    # Monitor model health

+ - **Run specific project tests:**
+   ```bash
+   pnpm nx test <project>
+   ```
+ - **Run affected tests:**
+   ```bash
+   pnpm nx affected:test
+   ```
+ 
+ ### Nx E2E Commands
+ 
+ - **Run all E2E tests:**
+   ```bash
+   pnpm nx run-many --target=e2e --all
+   ```
+ - **Run specific E2E tests:**
+   ```bash
+   pnpm nx e2e <project>
+   ```
+ - **Run affected E2E tests:**
+   ```bash
+   pnpm nx affected:e2e
+   ```
+ 
  ## Documentation
  
```

- ## Troubleshooting
- 
- ### Common Issues
- 
- 1. **ESM Import Issues**
-    - Ensure all local imports use `.js` extension
-    - Check `package.json` has `"type": "module"`
-    - Verify `tsconfig.json` uses `"module": "NodeNext"`
- 
- 2. **Cache Issues**
-    - Clear Nx cache: `pnpm nx reset`
-    - Remove node_modules: `rm -rf node_modules`
-    - Reinstall: `pnpm install`
- 
- 3. **Build Failures**
-    - Check implicit dependencies in project.json
-    - Verify all required dependencies are built
-    - Check for circular dependencies
- 
- ### Debugging Tips
- 
- 1. **Enable Verbose Logging**
-    ```bash
-    # Enable Nx verbose logging
-    NX_VERBOSE_LOGGING=true pnpm nx build myapp
- 
-    # Enable pnpm verbose logging
-    pnpm install --loglevel debug
-    ```
- 
- 2. **Show Project Graph**
-    ```bash
-    # Show dependency graph
-    pnpm nx graph
- 
-    # Show project details
-    pnpm nx show project myapp
-    ```
- 
- ## Best Practices
- 
- 1. **Code Organization**
-    - Keep related code in the same library
-    - Use clear naming conventions
-    - Maintain proper dependency boundaries
- 
- 2. **Development Workflow**
-    - Use affected commands for CI
-    - Leverage Nx Cloud for distributed caching
-    - Minimize project dependencies
- 
- 3. **Testing Strategy**
-    - Write unit tests for libraries
-    - Use E2E tests for applications
-    - Maintain good test coverage
- 
- 4. **Performance**
-    - Use SWC for faster builds
-    - Implement proper caching
-    - Optimize project dependencies

- 3. **Test Optimization**
-    - Use parallel execution
-    - Configure test caching
-    - Monitor performance
+ 2. **Runtime Performance**
+    - Implement proper code splitting
+    - Use lazy loading where appropriate
+    - Optimize bundle sizes
+    - Monitor runtime metrics
  
  ## Troubleshooting
  
  ### Common Issues
  
- 1. **ESM Import Issues**
-    - Ensure all local imports use `.js` extension
-    - Check `package.json` has `"type": "module"`
-    - Verify `tsconfig.json` uses `"module": "NodeNext"`
- 
- 2. **Cache Issues**
-    - Clear Nx cache: `nx reset`
-    - Remove node_modules: `rm -rf node_modules`
-    - Reinstall: `pnpm install`
- 
- 3. **Build Failures**
-    - Check implicit dependencies in project.json
-    - Verify all required dependencies are built
-    - Check for circular dependencies
- 
- ### Debugging
- 
- 1. **Build Debugging**
+ 1. **Cache Issues**
+    ```bash
+    # Clear cache
+    nx reset
+ 
+    # Verify cache
+    nx show cache
+ 
+    # Disable cache
+    nx build myapp --skip-nx-cache
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Build Failures**
     ```bash
-    # Enable verbose logging
-    nx build my-app --verbose
+    # Show build errors
+    nx build myapp --verbose
  
-    # Show dependency graph
+    # Check dependencies
     nx graph
  
-    # Show affected projects
-    nx affected:graph
+    # Verify project configuration
+    nx show project myapp
     ```
  
- 2. **Test Debugging**
+ 3. **Performance Issues**
     ```bash
-    # Run tests in watch mode
-    nx test my-app --watch
-    
-    # Run tests with coverage
-    nx test my-app --coverage
-    
-    # Run specific test file
-    nx test my-app --testFile=my-test.spec.ts
-    ```
- 
- 3. **Cache Debugging**
+    # Profile build
+    nx build myapp --profile
+ 
+    # Show project graph
+    nx graph
+ 
+    # Analyze dependencies
+    nx dep-graph
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Debugging Tips
+ 
+ 1. **Enable Verbose Logging**
+    ```bash
+    # Enable Nx verbose logging
+    NX_VERBOSE_LOGGING=true nx build myapp
+ 
+    # Show detailed errors
+    nx build myapp --verbose
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Project Analysis**
     ```bash
-    # Show cache status
-    nx show-cache
-    
-    # Clear cache
-    nx reset
-    
-    # Show cache hits
-    nx show-cache-hits
-    ```
- 
- ### Performance Issues
- 
- 1. **Slow Builds**
-    - Check cache hit rate
-    - Verify project graph
-    - Monitor resource usage
- 
- 2. **High Memory Usage**
-    - Check build configuration
-    - Monitor memory limits
-    - Optimize dependencies
- 
- 3. **Slow Tests**
-    - Check test configuration
-    - Monitor resource usage
-    - Optimize test setup
- 
- ### Nx Cloud Issues
- 
- 1. **Connection Issues**
-    - Check network connection
-    - Verify access token
-    - Check cloud status
- 
- 2. **Cache Issues**
-    - Check cache configuration
-    - Verify cache storage
-    - Review cache logs
- 
- 3. **Performance Issues**
-    - Check cloud configuration
-    - Monitor performance metrics
-    - Review performance logs
+    # Show project details
+    nx show project myapp
+ 
+    # Show affected projects
+    nx affected:apps
+ 
+    # Show project graph
+    nx graph
+    ```
  
  ## Deployment

```diff
  
  > **See Also**: [Changelog](../CHANGELOG.md) for version history.
- > **See Also**: [Roadmap](../ROADMAP.md) for future plans. 
+ > **See Also**: [Roadmap](../ROADMAP.md) for future plans.
+ 
+ ## Nx and pnpm Migration
+ 
+ ### Nx Migration
+ 
+ * **Nx Changes**
+   * New Nx Cloud integration
+   * Updated caching system
+   * Changed project graph
+   * New analytics
+   * New performance monitoring
+   * New dependency management
+ 
+ * **Migration Steps**
+   ```bash
+   # Update Nx
+   pnpm update nx@latest
+ 
+   # Update Nx Cloud
+   pnpm nx connect-to-nx-cloud
+ 
+   # Migrate cache
+   pnpm nx cache migrate
+ 
+   # Update project graph
+   pnpm nx graph --file=project-graph.json
+ 
+   # Enable analytics
+   pnpm nx show-analytics
+ 
+   # Enable performance monitoring
+   pnpm nx show-performance
+   ```
+ 
+ ### pnpm Migration
+ 
+ * **pnpm Changes**
+   * New workspace features
+   * Updated dependency resolution
+   * Changed lockfile format
+   * New store management
+   * New security features
+   * New performance optimizations
+ 
+ * **Migration Steps**
+   ```bash
+   # Update pnpm
+   pnpm add -g pnpm@latest
+ 
+   # Update workspace
+   pnpm update
+ 
+   # Migrate lockfile
+   pnpm install --fix-lockfile
+ 
+   # Clean store
+   pnpm store prune
+ 
+   # Verify dependencies
+   pnpm why
+ 
+   # Check workspace
+   pnpm status
+   ```
+ 
+ ### Combined Migration Steps
+ 
+ 1. **Update Core Tools**
+    ```bash
+    # Update Nx and pnpm
+    pnpm add -g pnpm@latest
+    pnpm update nx@latest
+ 
+    # Update workspace
+    pnpm update
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Migrate Configuration**
+    ```bash
+    # Update Nx config
+    pnpm nx migrate latest
+ 
+    # Update pnpm config
+    pnpm config set store-dir .pnpm-store
+    pnpm config set cache-dir .pnpm-cache
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Migrate Dependencies**
+    ```bash
+    # Update dependencies
+    pnpm update
+ 
+    # Fix lockfile
+    pnpm install --fix-lockfile
+ 
+    # Clean store
+    pnpm store prune
+    ```
+ 
+ 4. **Migrate Cache**
+    ```bash
+    # Migrate Nx cache
+    pnpm nx cache migrate
+ 
+    # Clean pnpm cache
+    pnpm store prune
+    ```
+ 
+ 5. **Verify Migration**
+    ```bash
+    # Check Nx status
+    pnpm nx show workspace
+ 
+    # Check pnpm status
+    pnpm status
+ 
+    # Verify dependencies
+    pnpm why
+ 
+    # Test build
+    pnpm nx build
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Troubleshooting Migration
+ 
+ 1. **Cache Issues**
+    ```bash
+    # Reset Nx cache
+    pnpm nx reset
+ 
+    # Clean pnpm store
+    pnpm store prune
+ 
+    # Verify cache
+    pnpm nx show-cache
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Dependency Issues**
+    ```bash
+    # Fix dependencies
+    pnpm install --fix-lockfile
+ 
+    # Rebuild dependencies
+    pnpm rebuild
+ 
+    # Check dependency tree
+    pnpm why
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Workspace Issues**
+    ```bash
+    # Clean workspace
+    pnpm clean
+ 
+    # Update workspace
+    pnpm update
+ 
+    # Check workspace
+    pnpm status
+    ```
+ 
+ 4. **Build Issues**
+    ```bash
+    # Fix build
+    pnpm nx build --fix
+ 
+    # Show build errors
+    pnpm nx show-errors
+ 
+    # Show build logs
+    pnpm nx show-builds
+    ```
+ 
+ > **See Also**: [Nx Guide](../NX_GUIDE.md) and [Toolchain](../TOOLCHAIN.md) for detailed information about Nx and pnpm features. 
```

  This guide provides comprehensive documentation for using Nx in the nootropic project.
```

  ## Getting Started

```diff
  - pnpm 8+
  - Nx CLI (installed globally or via pnpm)
- - Git
- - Docker (for containerized development)
  
- ### Initial Setup
+ ### Installation
  
+ 1. **Create Nx Workspace**
     ```bash
     # Create new Nx workspace
- npx create-nx-workspace@latest nootropic --preset=empty --packageManager=pnpm
- cd nootropic
+    pnpm dlx create-nx-workspace@latest nootropic --preset=empty --packageManager=pnpm
  
     # Install dependencies
     pnpm install
  
     # Configure Nx Cloud
- npx nx g @nx/workspace:setup-nx-cloud
- ```
- 
- ### Project Generation
- 
+    pnpm nx g @nx/workspace:setup-nx-cloud
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Configure Workspace**
+    ```json
+    // nx.json
+    {
+      "extends": "@nx/workspace/presets/npm.json",
+      "affected": {
+        "defaultBase": "main"
+      },
+      "tasksRunnerOptions": {
+        "default": {
+          "runner": "@nx/workspace/tasks-runners/default",
+          "options": {
+            "cacheableOperations": ["build", "test", "lint", "e2e"]
+          }
+        }
+      },
+      "targetDefaults": {
+        "build": {
+          "dependsOn": ["^build"],
+          "inputs": ["production", "^production"]
+        },
+        "test": {
+          "inputs": ["default", "^production"]
+        },
+        "lint": {
+          "inputs": ["default", "{workspaceRoot}/.eslintrc.json"]
+        }
+      }
+    }
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Project Management
+ 
+ 1. **Creating Projects**
+    ```bash
+    # Create shared library
+    pnpm nx g @nx/js:lib shared --publishable --importPath=@nootropic/shared
+ 
+    # Create CLI application
+    pnpm nx g @nx/js:application cli --framework=none --bundler=esbuild
+ 
+    # Create React component
+    pnpm nx g @nx/react:component my-component --project=shared
+ 
+    # Create Node service
+    pnpm nx g @nx/node:service my-service --project=cli
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Managing Projects**
+    ```bash
+    # List projects
+    pnpm nx list
+ 
+    # Show project details
+    pnpm nx show project nootropic-cli
+ 
+    # View project graph
+    pnpm nx graph
+ 
+    # View affected graph
+    pnpm nx affected:graph
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Project Dependencies**
+    ```bash
+    # Show dependencies
+    pnpm nx show dependencies
+ 
+    # Show affected projects
+    pnpm nx affected:apps
+ 
+    # Show affected libs
+    pnpm nx affected:libs
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Development Workflow
+ 
+ 1. **Running Projects**
+    ```bash
+    # Start all projects
+    pnpm nx run-many --target=serve --all
+ 
+    # Start specific project
+    pnpm nx serve nootropic-cli
+ 
+    # Start with watch mode
+    pnpm nx serve nootropic-cli --watch
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Testing Projects**
+    ```bash
+    # Run all tests
+    pnpm nx run-many --target=test --all
+ 
+    # Run specific project tests
+    pnpm nx test nootropic-cli
+ 
+    # Run affected tests
+    pnpm nx affected:test
+ 
+    # Run tests with coverage
+    pnpm nx test nootropic-cli --coverage
+ 
+    # Run tests in watch mode
+    pnpm nx test nootropic-cli --watch
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Building Projects**
+    ```bash
+    # Build all projects
+    pnpm nx run-many --target=build --all
+ 
+    # Build specific project
+    pnpm nx build nootropic-cli
+ 
+    # Build affected projects
+    pnpm nx affected:build
+ 
+    # Build with production config
+    pnpm nx build nootropic-cli --configuration=production
+    ```
+ 
+ 4. **Linting Projects**
+    ```bash
+    # Lint all projects
+    pnpm nx run-many --target=lint --all
+ 
+    # Lint specific project
+    pnpm nx lint nootropic-cli
+ 
+    # Lint affected projects
+    pnpm nx affected:lint
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Nx Cloud
+ 
+ 1. **Setup**
+    ```bash
+    # Initialize Nx Cloud
+    pnpm nx g @nx/workspace:setup-nx-cloud
+ 
+    # Configure Nx Cloud
+    pnpm nx connect-to-nx-cloud
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Usage**
+    ```bash
+    # Open Nx Cloud dashboard
+    pnpm nx cloud
+ 
+    # View project details
+    pnpm nx show project nootropic-cli --web
+ 
+    # View build analytics
+    pnpm nx show-builds
+ 
+    # View test analytics
+    pnpm nx show-tests
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Analytics**
+    ```bash
+    # Show build analytics
+    pnpm nx show-builds
+ 
+    # Show test analytics
+    pnpm nx show-tests
+ 
+    # Show performance analytics
+    pnpm nx show-performance
+ 
+    # Show usage analytics
+    pnpm nx show-usage
+    ```
+ 
+ 4. **Cache Management**
     ```bash
- # Generate a new library
- nx g @nx/js:lib shared --publishable --importPath=@nootropic/shared
- 
- # Generate an application
- nx g @nx/js:application cli --framework=none --bundler=esbuild
- 
- # Generate a React component
- nx g @nx/react:component my-component --project=shared
- 
- # Generate a Node.js service
- nx g @nx/node:service my-service --project=cli
- ```
+    # Clear cache
+    pnpm nx reset
+ 
+    # Clear project cache
+    pnpm nx reset --project=nootropic-cli
+ 
+    # Clear all cache
+    pnpm nx reset --all
+ 
+    # Show cache status
+    pnpm nx show-cache
+    ```
+ 
+ ### Best Practices
+ 
+ 1. **Project Structure**
+    - Use consistent naming conventions
+    - Organize projects by feature
+    - Share code through libraries
+    - Use proper dependency management
+ 
+ 2. **Dependency Management**
+    ```bash
+    # Update dependencies
+    pnpm update
+ 
+    # Update specific package
+    pnpm update package-name
+ 
+    # Update to latest versions
+    pnpm update --latest
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Performance Optimization**
+    - Use Nx Cloud for caching
+    - Enable parallel execution
+    - Optimize build configurations
+    - Monitor performance metrics
+ 
+ 4. **Security**
+    - Keep dependencies updated
+    - Use security scanning
+    - Follow best practices
+    - Monitor security alerts
  
  ## Project Structure
```

-   }

+ 1. **Initialize Workspace**
+    ```bash
+    # Initialize Nx workspace
+    pnpm dlx create-nx-workspace@latest nootropic --preset=ts
+ 
+    # Install dependencies
+    pnpm install
+ 
+    # Configure Nx Cloud
+    pnpm nx g @nx/workspace:setup-nx-cloud
+    ```
+ 
+ 2. **Development Commands**
+    ```bash
+    # Start development server
+    pnpm nx serve nootropic-cli
+ 
+    # Run tests
+    pnpm nx test nootropic-cli
+ 
+    # Build project
+    pnpm nx build nootropic-cli
+ 
+    # Lint project
+    pnpm nx lint nootropic-cli
+    ```
+ 
+ 3. **Project Generation**
+    ```bash
+    # Generate React app
+    pnpm nx g @nx/react:app my-app
+ 
+    # Generate library
+    pnpm nx g @nx/js:lib my-lib
+ 
+    # Generate component
+    pnpm nx g @nx/react:component my-component
+ 
+    # Generate service
+    pnpm nx g @nx/js:service my-service
+    ```
+ 
+ 4. **Nx Cloud Management**
+    ```bash
+    # Reset cloud cache
+    pnpm nx cloud reset
+ 
+    # Reset project cache
+    pnpm nx cloud reset --project=my-project
+ 
+    # Reset all cache
+    pnpm nx cloud reset --all
+ 
+    # Setup Nx Cloud
+    pnpm nx g @nx/workspace:setup-nx-cloud
+ 
+    # Set cloud token
+    pnpm nx cloud set-token
+ 
+    # Set cloud URL
+    pnpm nx cloud set-url
+ 
+    # Connect to cloud
+    pnpm nx cloud connect
+ 
+    # Sync with cloud
+    pnpm nx cloud sync
+ 
+    # Manage cloud cache
+    pnpm nx cloud cache
+    ```
+ 
+ 5. **Cache Management**
+    ```bash
+    # Clear cache
+    pnpm nx reset
+ 
+    # Clear project cache
+    pnpm nx reset --project=my-project
+ 
+    # Clear all cache
+    pnpm nx reset --all
+ 
+    # Update Nx
+    pnpm update @nx/workspace
+ 
+    # Update Nx plugins
+    pnpm update @nx/react @nx/node
+    ```
+ 
+ 6. **Build Management**
+    ```bash
+    # Build all projects
+    pnpm nx run-many --target=build --all
+ 
+    # Build specific project
+    pnpm nx build my-project
+ 
+    # Build with clean
+    pnpm nx build my-project --clean
+    ```
+ 
+ 7. **Test Management**
+    ```bash
+    # Run all tests
+    pnpm nx run-many --target=test --all
+ 
+    # Run specific tests
+    pnpm nx test nootropic-cli
+ 
+    # Run tests with coverage
+    pnpm nx test nootropic-cli --coverage
+ 
+    # Run tests in watch mode
+    pnpm nx test nootropic-cli --watch
     ```
  
```

     ```

+ ### Basic Commands
+ 
+ ```bash
+ # Start development server
+ pnpm nx serve <app-name>
+ 
+ # Build project
+ pnpm nx build <project-name>
+ 
+ # Run tests

+ 
+ # Run linting
+ pnpm nx lint <project-name>
+

+ pnpm nx affected:build
+ pnpm nx affected:test
+ pnpm nx affected:lint

+ ## Core Concepts
+ 
+ ### Project Graph
+ 
+ Nx maintains a project graph that tracks dependencies between projects. This graph is used to:
+ - Determine affected projects
+ - Optimize build order
+ - Enable distributed execution
+ - Support parallel builds
+ - Manage cache invalidation
+ - Track project dependencies
+ - Visualize project relationships
+ - Optimize resource usage
+ - Enable distributed caching
+ - Support distributed testing
+ 
+ ### Workspace Configuration
+ 
+ The workspace is configured in `nx.json`:
+ 
  ```json
-    // nx.json
  {
    "extends": "@nx/workspace/presets/npm.json",
```

```diff
  ```
  
- ### Project Management
- 
- 1. **Creating Projects**
-    ```bash
-    # Create shared library
-    pnpm nx g @nx/js:lib shared --publishable --importPath=@nootropic/shared
- 
-    # Create CLI application
-    pnpm nx g @nx/js:application cli --framework=none --bundler=esbuild
- 
-    # Create React component
-    pnpm nx g @nx/react:component my-component --project=shared
- 
-    # Create Node service
-    pnpm nx g @nx/node:service my-service --project=cli
- 
-    # Create AI/LLM-friendly project
-    pnpm nx g @nx/js:lib ai-utils --tags=ai,llm
-    ```
- 
- 2. **Managing Projects**
-    ```bash

-    pnpm nx list
-

-    pnpm nx show project nootropic-cli

-    pnpm nx affected:graph

-    # View AI/LLM-friendly graph

- 
-    # View distributed execution graph

-    ```

-    ```bash
-    # Clear cache
-    pnpm nx reset
- 
-    # Clear project cache
-    pnpm nx reset --project=nootropic-cli
- 
-    # Clear all cache
-    pnpm nx reset --all
- 
-    # Show cache status
-    pnpm nx show-cache
- 
-    # Show pnpm cache status
-    pnpm nx show-pnpm-cache
- 
-    # Show distributed cache status
-    pnpm nx show-distributed-cache
-    ```
- 
- ### Best Practices
- 
- 1. **Project Structure**
-    - Use consistent naming conventions
-    - Organize projects by feature
-    - Share code through libraries
-    - Use proper dependency management
- 
- 2. **Dependency Management**
-    ```bash
-    # Update dependencies
-    pnpm update
- 
-    # Update specific package
-    pnpm update package-name
- 
-    # Update to latest versions
-    pnpm update --latest
-    ```
- 
- 3. **Performance Optimization**
-    - Use Nx Cloud for caching
-    - Enable parallel execution
-    - Optimize build configurations
-    - Monitor performance metrics
- 
- 4. **Security**
-    - Keep dependencies updated
-    - Use security scanning
-    - Follow best practices
-    - Monitor security alerts

  ## Project Structure
+ 
+ ### Directory Layout
  
  ```
  nootropic/
  ├── apps/                    # Application projects
- │   ├── cli/                # CLI application
- │   │   ├── src/           # Source code
- │   │   ├── test/          # Test files
- │   │   └── project.json   # Project configuration
- │   ├── electron/          # Electron application
- │   └── vscode-extension/  # VS Code extension
- ├── libs/                   # Shared libraries
- │   ├── shared/            # Common utilities
- │   │   ├── src/          # Source code
- │   │   ├── test/         # Test files
- │   │   └── project.json  # Project configuration
- │   ├── runtime/          # Runtime components
- │   └── adapters/         # External service adapters
- ├── tools/                  # Build and development tools
- │   ├── generators/        # Custom generators
- │   └── executors/         # Custom executors
- ├── nx.json                # Nx configuration
- ├── package.json           # Root package.json
- └── tsconfig.base.json    # Base TypeScript configuration
- ```
- 
- ## Development Workflow
- 
- ### Running Applications
- 
- ```bash
- # Start development server
- nx serve electron
- 
- # Build for production
- nx build electron
- 
- # Run tests
- nx test shared
- 
- # Run linting
- nx lint shared
- 
- # Run E2E tests
- nx e2e cli-e2e
- ```

- # Run tests for affected projects

- nx affected:apps
- 
- # Run linting on affected projects
- nx affected:lint
- 
- # Run E2E tests on affected projects
- nx affected:e2e
- ```

- // nx.json
- {

-         "default",
-         "^default",

-         "{workspaceRoot}/tsconfig.base.json"
-       ],

-       "cache": true
-     },

-       "dependsOn": ["^build"],
-       "inputs": [
-         "default",
-         "^default",

-       ],
-       "cache": true

-         "default",

+ │   ├── electron/           # Electron application

  ### Project Configuration
+ 
+ Each project has its own configuration in `project.json`:
  
  ```json
- // project.json
  {
-   "name": "nootropic-cli",
+   "name": "project-name",
+   "projectType": "application",
+   "sourceRoot": "apps/project-name/src",
    "targets": {
      "build": {
-       "executor": "@nx/vite:build",
+       "executor": "@nx/js:swc",
        "outputs": ["{options.outputPath}"],
        "options": {
-         "outputPath": "dist/apps/nootropic-cli",
-         "main": "apps/nootropic-cli/src/main.ts",
-         "tsConfig": "apps/nootropic-cli/tsconfig.app.json",
-         "assets": ["apps/nootropic-cli/src/assets"],
-         "index": "apps/nootropic-cli/src/index.html",
-         "baseHref": "/",
-         "sourcemap": true,
-         "optimize": true
+         "outputPath": "dist/apps/project-name",
+         "main": "apps/project-name/src/main.ts",
+         "tsConfig": "apps/project-name/tsconfig.app.json",
+         "assets": ["apps/project-name/src/assets"]
        },
        "configurations": {
          "production": {
-           "mode": "production",
-           "sourcemap": false,
-           "minify": true,
-           "optimize": true
-         },
-         "staging": {
-           "mode": "staging",
-           "sourcemap": true,
-           "minify": true,
-           "optimize": true
+           "optimization": true,
+           "extractLicenses": true,
+           "inspect": false
          }
        }

+ ## Development Workflow
+ 
+ ### Starting Development
+ 
+ ```bash
+ # Start all applications
+ pnpm nx run-many --target=serve --all
+ 
+ # Start specific application
+ pnpm nx serve <app-name>
+ 
+ # Start with specific configuration
+ pnpm nx serve <app-name> --configuration=development
+ ```
+ 
+ ### Running Tests
+ 
+ ```bash
+ # Run all tests
+ pnpm nx run-many --target=test --all
+ 
+ # Run specific project tests
+ pnpm nx test <project-name>
+ 
+ # Run with coverage
+ pnpm nx test <project-name> --coverage
+ 
+ # Run affected tests
+ pnpm nx affected:test
+ ```
+ 
+ ### Building Projects
+ 
+ ```bash
+ # Build all projects
+ pnpm nx run-many --target=build --all
+ 
+ # Build specific project
+ pnpm nx build <project-name>
+ 
+ # Build with production configuration
+ pnpm nx build <project-name> --configuration=production
+ 
+ # Build affected projects
+ pnpm nx affected:build
+ ```

+ ## Build System
+ 
+ ### SWC Compiler
+ 
+ We use SWC for fast TypeScript compilation:
  
  ```json
- // tsconfig.base.json
  {
-   "compilerOptions": {
-     "rootDir": ".",
-     "sourceMap": true,
-     "declaration": true,
-     "moduleResolution": "node",
-     "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
-     "esModuleInterop": true,
-     "strict": true,
-     "skipLibCheck": true,
-     "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
-     "resolveJsonModule": true,
-     "isolatedModules": true,
-     "noEmit": true,
-     "jsx": "react-jsx",
-     "lib": ["dom", "dom.iterable", "esnext"],
-     "module": "esnext",
-     "target": "es2015",
-     "baseUrl": ".",
-     "paths": {
-       "@nootropic/*": ["libs/*/src/index.ts"]
+   "build": {
+     "executor": "@nx/js:swc",
+     "options": {
+       "swcOptions": {
+         "jsc": {
+           "parser": {
+             "syntax": "typescript",
+             "tsx": true,
+             "decorators": true
+           },
+           "transform": {
+             "legacyDecorator": true,
+             "decoratorMetadata": true
            }
-   },
-   "exclude": ["node_modules", "tmp"]
+         }
+       }
+     }
+   }
  }
  ```

+ - Build artifacts

+ - E2E test results

- ## Deployment
- 
- ### Docker Deployment
- 
- ```dockerfile
- # Base image
- FROM node:18-alpine AS base
- RUN npm install -g pnpm nx
- 
- # Builder image
- FROM base AS builder
- WORKDIR /app
- COPY . .
- RUN pnpm install
- RUN nx build nootropic-cli
- 
- # Production image
- FROM base AS production
- WORKDIR /app
- COPY --from=builder /app/dist/apps/nootropic-cli ./dist
- CMD ["node", "dist/main.js"]
- ```
- 
- ### Kubernetes Deployment
- 
- ```yaml
- # k8s/deployment.yaml
- apiVersion: apps/v1
- kind: Deployment
- metadata:
-   name: nootropic-cli
- spec:
-   replicas: 3
-   selector:
-     matchLabels:
-       app: nootropic-cli
-   template:
-     metadata:
-       labels:
-         app: nootropic-cli
-     spec:
-       containers:
-         - name: nootropic-cli
-           image: nootropic/cli:latest
-           resources:
-             requests:
-               cpu: "100m"
-               memory: "128Mi"
-             limits:
-               cpu: "500m"
-               memory: "512Mi"
- ```

   - Updated Node.js requirements

   - Updated `nx.json` configuration
   - Added distributed execution settings
   - Added parallel execution settings
   - Added cache directory configuration
   - Added JS plugin configuration

4. **Build System Updates**:
   - Added SWC compiler configuration
   - Added esbuild bundler configuration
   - Added distributed build support
   - Added parallel build support

5. **Testing Updates**:
   - Added distributed testing support
   - Added parallel testing support
   - Added test caching configuration
   - Added test analytics support

6. **Cache Management**:
   - Added distributed caching support
   - Added parallel caching support
   - Added cache directory configuration
   - Added cache invalidation strategies

   - Added distributed execution support
   - Added parallel execution support
